BasicDetails.Description:
Upon entering the apartment the unrivaled level of quality and workmanship is evident. You are greeted in a spectacular foyer of rich marble flooring, extravagant black lacquered and gold-leaf gilded doors and moldings, and custom designed overhead lighting setting the stage for the opulence ahead of you. The layout of this 6 bedroom apartment, flows seamlessly radiating from the central entryway to every section of this (approx.) 4,415 square foot masterpiece. Just off the grand foyer you will find expansive communal entertaining spaces, the Chef's kitchen, and the Master Suite wing. You are invited, and encouraged, to walk through the unit slowly to appreciate the highest levels of craftsmanship that have gone into every aspect of this property. However, don't let the opulence distract you from the extraordinary views from every window - East to Central Park, West to the Hudson River and South for an extensive full view of the City. The building, One Central Park West, matches the stature of the apartment, as one of Manhattan's most prestigious and well-run addresses, unit #47BC is one of its largest apartments.

The Great Room, with its floor to ceiling windows, gives a breathtaking perspective of Columbus Circle, Central Park South, Midtown's most iconic buildings and the lower half of Central Park. It's difficult to peal yourself away from the glass walls. This wonderful space is a continuation of all the luxurious appointments; with additional custom built millwork, professionally designed and lit ceiling as well as parquet de Versailles wood floors saved and reconstructed from a French Chateau.

The formal Dining Room shares the reclaimed parquet flooring with the Great Room, anchoring the Eastern and Western edges (85' span) of the apartment in perfect symmetry. Here you can dine in a royal setting with calming views of the Hudson River. The attention to detail in every room is substantial, too broad to thoroughly catalogue. Some prime examples of the dedication and resources that have gone into #47BC include: four distinct types of marble flooring intricately laid for optimal design (Nero Marquina, Rosso Alicante, Crema Valencia & White Staturio), extensive custom built artisanal millwork in every room, gold-leaf gilding, exceptional storage with eight large walk-in closets/dressing rooms and a Chef's dream kitchen expertly equipped by Gaggenau and SubZero.

The Master Bath is so glamorous you would think it only existed in the movies or at the Duomo in Florence. Behold the enormous window view Jacuzzi tub surrounded by floor to ceiling Lapis Lazuli stone hand-picked by European craftsman with matching marble floors. Luxuriate in this Zen-inducing private spa just off of the expansive master bedroom. The master bedroom is exquisite with floor to ceiling windows, custom ceiling molding and lighting.

East Landing Peconic Bay beach home that has been completely renovated inside and out. Beautiful five bedrooms, three and one half bath gives you enormous possibilities for year round or summer living. Great room with sliders to beautiful outdoor area with pool. Move right in to your dream home with Bay beach access for swimming, paddle boarding, kayaking, etc.

Located in the heart of the West Village, this two bedroom, two and half bathroom home resides in a full service new development. Built to the most exacting standards, this home has undergone a full gut renovation with details to include a sauna, a custom Japanese soaking tub, and a steam shower, all crafted with book matched hand cut marble. Designed for an extremely sophisticated and stylish buyer, the interpretation and finish level is unrivaled. Differentiating details include 11 inch fumed oak floors that introduce the warmth of this home upon entry, a raised ceiling heights to accommodate a wood inlay, and a fully renovated kitchen where no detail was overlooked. A large island showcases an oversized marble slab with a gorgeous and distinct striation, and top of the line appliances include the crown jewel of ranges: a La Cornue equipped with a vented hood and matching hardware that complement the custom cabinetry that runs to the ceiling. Well-appointed closets are located throughout this residence, including an oversized walk-in closet in the master. In addition, the unit's split bedroom layout provides wonderful privacy. Located just across from the Hudson River, One Morton Square is one of the most iconic and compelling projects in the West Village, and offers 24-hour doorman service, a full time super, a gym, and both bike and general storage rooms.

Museum quality renovation just completed of this two bedroom with two full baths on the best block in SoHo. Enter off of your private key-locked elevator and into a stunning living room with towering ceilings, incredible proportions and enormous windows letting tons of natural light pour in throughout the day. Wide plank floors, newly installed and perfectly finished, lead you to a large dining area easily accommodating ten. The open chefs kitchen has custom cabinets, stone counters and stainless steel appliances. As you walk through the space youll notice the incredible detail including custom floor to ceiling solid core doors and custom closets. The east facing bedrooms are flooded with light and are pin-drop quiet. The master is literally fit for a King with ample space for a separate seating area. Your custom dressing room leads to a five piece spa-like master bath. Located on cobblestone paved Greene between Prince and Spring, the block is literally one of the best in SoHo. The building is a great example of Cast Iron architecture. Amazing restaurants and some of the worlds best shopping and entertainment are right outside.

100 Norfolk - One Hundred Reasons to Be Here www.100norfolk.com

Expansive Three Bedroom, Three and a half bath apartment with Dramatic Downtown Views.

A new architectural masterpiece on the Lower Eastside of Manhattan, 100 Norfolk dazzles the eye with its striking glass façade, cantilevered above tree lined streets like an elegantly lit chandelier.The chiseled glass and truss tower, designed by Eran Chen of ODA, guards and illuminates 38 spectacular homes.

Consisting of studio through three-bedroom residences, all of the homes at 100 Norfolk tout double pane floor-to-ceiling windows, oak flooring, ample closet space, a washer and dryer, as well as central air and heating systems. Open custom kitchens feature Quartz counter tops and backslashes, high gloss lacquer cabinetry locally manufactured by Bazzeo, and top-of-the-line appliances by Gaggenau.

Expansive living rooms are set against walls of windows, while gracious master suites provide a serene and private retreat. Decadent master bathrooms are complete with walnut vanities with marble countertops, deep soaking tubs, and glass showers. Several homes throughout the building offer private outdoor terraces.

Residents and guests will be greeted by a 24-hour concierge and welcomed into the building through a dramatic entry way and sophisticated lobby featuring a double height ceiling, Millwork architectural wood wall and glowing fireplace. The building is also expected to offer an anticipated 421-a tax abatement.

While the concierge will cater to the needs of all building residents, the building also offers a state-of-the-art gym, yoga room and the opportunity to relax and revel in the outdoors on the common roof deck and outdoor garden lounge. Other coveted amenities include a resident bicycle room and additional storage space available for purchase.

100 Norfolk is the result of another successful partnership with real estate developer Adam America Real Estate (AARE), along with partners The Naveh Shuster Group and The Horizon Group.Anticipated completion Spring 2017The complete offering terms are in an Offering Plan available from Sponsor, File No. CD13-0148.

100 Norfolk - One Hundred Reasons to Be Here

100 West 119th Street 3D is a four bedroom, two bathroom home that enjoys the view of plush trees from each of its three living room windows. This Harlem condominium is accented by a Washer/Dryer, full-sized Dishwasher, Stainless Steel Appliances and even a working fireplace that the owners have used every winter for the past ten years. Located on West 119th Street and Lenox Avenue within the Mt Morris Park Historic District, its building, The Normandie, was built in 1910 and completely rebuilt along with its original façade in 2005. The Normandie provides a full-time concierge, a common roof deck, fitness room and kids playroom to every resident. It is located just three street blocks from the 2/3 Express and a short walk to the B/C trains. New retail storefronts are blossoming along Lenox with an outdoor swimming pool and Marcus Garvey Park nearby. Stunning midtown and breathtaking Harlem skyline views are seen from the building's furnished roof-deck and the serviced lobby provides everything prewar. Join us Sunday, October 15th from 1:30pm to 3:30pm to celebrate the arrival of our Harlem market's only four bedroom prewar condominium south of 125th Street below $2M.

Located in Greenwich Village, this completely gut renovated studio will definitely impress you.Originally a straight studio, famed Decorator Harry Schnaper transformed the space by creating an alcove and a hallway with many built in closets on either side. The kitchen and bathroom are stunning and new. Custom lighting throughout. Plenty of storage, move right in!The John Adams is a well know coop with a 24 hour doorman, beautiful roof deck, laundry room and live in super. Close to 1,2,3 and B,D,F,M,L and Path Trains.

Views as far as the eye can see from this spectacular three bedroom home with towering ceilings and floor to ceiling windows, three full baths and private laundry, all in a spectacular full-service Tribeca condominium. Facing south-east with fantastic light throughout the day, this barely lived in home is showroom perfect.

Enter into a large entry gallery and be ushered into the incredible corner living room with 180 degree views overlooking all of Tribeca from Midtown to New York Harbor and everything in between. Chef's will be at home in the expertly designed Bulthaup kitchen with stone counters and integrated Miele and Sub-Zero appliances.

Your enormous master suite faces east, with two walk-in closets, and easily accommodates a king sized bed with adjacent sitting area. The five piece master bath with side by side sinks, glass enclosed shower and extra deep soaking tub is the perfect escape from the busy city. The separate secondary bedrooms are equally generous and face south with exceptional light throughout the day.

101 Warren is an award winning example of the marriage between classic details and modern styling. Its limestone, steel and glass facade showcase the impeccable detail architect Skidmore, Owings and Merrill is known more. Amenities include twenty-four doorman, resident lounge, fifth floor Pine forest and private fitness center.

Whole Foods, Soul Cycle, Bed, Bath and Beyond and Barnes and Noble are right downstairs. Brookfield Place, Le District and Eataly are each minutes from your front door. The 1/2/3/A/C/E are nearby making getting anywhere in the city as easy as can be. Fantastic restaurants and Washington Market, Duane and Hudson River Parks are each right outside.

This GIGANTIC LOFT-LIKE DUPLEX condo offers all the key checklist items--abundant space, ideal location, and an affordable price! This first floor unit is being utilized as a two bedroom layout, offering TWO FULL BATHS--one on each floor. Approximately 1146 square feet allows for a third bedroom or home office if you choose. 14 foot high ceilings and over-head storage supplements the plentiful closet space. There is also a shared outdoor patio for a quiet, peaceful place to relax, or host a barbeque. The location cannot be beat, with Atlantic Terminal, Barclay Center, numerous shopping and dining hotspots paces from your doorstep. NORTH PARK SLOPE is easily accessible to the Brooklyn Academy of Music, Prospect Park, and the Grand Army Farmer's Market.

Located in the "BLUE" condominium, one of the most iconic, ground up new developments on the Lower East Side, this beautiful, sun-drenched, and well-appointed two bedroom two bathroom residence offers view, light, and location windows. Designed by star-architect Bernard Tschumi and built to GREEN standards with sustainable and energy efficient materials, this home offers a hypnotic and unforgettable design that is evident upon one's arrival. Behind the unique, angled glass facade are spectacular open city views and western sunsets, visible from double exposures and floor-to-ceiling privacy-tinted windows in every room. The apartment contains a pristine, stainless steel chef's kitchen, equipped with professional-grade Viking appliances including wine refrigeration. The master bedroom is well proportioned and includes a large walk-in closet, as well as a bathroom that is unrivaled in light and design. This bathroom offers an oversized, windowed, floor to ceiling glass shower stall with a rain shower set alongside dual sinks, all of which are complimented by a river pebble tile detail. The second bedroom offers phenomenal light with dramatic views, and the second bathroom provides a deep Zuma soaking tub, Duravit fixtures, and excellent storage. The exclusive "BLUE? condominium also includes deeded, secure, in-building storage, 8,000 square feet of terraces overlooking the Williamsburg Bridge and downtown skyline, Fios internet, Fresh Direct refrigerators, a bike room, and a full-time doorman and concierge. Located 50 feet from the F-J-M-Z trains and just down the block from Schillers, this home is at the epicenter of one of New York's most dynamic neighborhoods. There is an ongoing assessment in the amount of $254 that is currently in effective.

Pure prestige Park Avenue location, corner unit with beautiful views out to the gardens of Park Avenue. Fabulously located near the 86th Street shopping district and convenient to all public transportation. Update this apartment for a live/work lifestyle with it's 10 foot ceiling and prewar details. Semi private outside entrance with white glove building services. Units has a large private storage cage and there is a health club in the basement.

Mint condition two bedroom loft flooded with southern light. When you step into the apartment you are immediately greeted by the oversized arched windows, 11 foot pressed tin ceilings, modern walnut paneling, an abundance of storage, castiron columns and luxurious dark wood floors. The modern kitchen features beautiful cabinetry, granite counters, Subzero refrigerator, Thermador range, dishwasher and plenty of room for entertaining. You may relax in the spacious bathroom and deep soaking tub. The apartment features a Miele washer and dryer, custom lighting and more. Amenities include stunning private roof deck and community garden, bicycle room, laundry room, storage and FiOS.

Sprawling two bedroom loft with beautiful tin ceilings, six over-sized south-facing windows, and in-unit washer-dryer, in a boutique elevator building on the edge of Chelsea and super-trendy NoMad. Upon entry, you're welcomed home into a massively airy open loft space, with nearly 11-foot-high tin ceilings and flooded with spectacular southern sunlight. Similarly spacious are your two king-sized bedrooms, and large open kitchen complete with Viking stove, breakfast bar, and plentiful cabinets and counters. A large lofted storage space above the bathroom has ample room for luggage, seasonal items, and other big pieces you'd like to keep out of the way. 107 West 25th Street is a well-maintained 25-unit coop in a circa 1900s Garment District loft building with stunning community roof garden, secure video intercom, fob keyed elevators, storage, bike room, laundry room, and Verizon FiOS optionality. One block from Madison Square Park, and minutes from the Chelsea Gallery District, The High Line, and Hudson River parks. Fairway, Whole Foods, Eataly, world-class shopping, and some of NYC's most noteworthy restaurants and trendsetting hotels are also at your doorstep. And with the F/M/1/R/W/6/C/E/PATH trains all within a stone's throw, you're perfectly positioned to easily travel anywhere, in or out of NYC.

Prewar elegance, a mere block from Central Park in a prime full-service Upper West Side co-op building! Wonderful high-floor 15B at 107 West 86th Street off Columbus Ave offers the perfect uptown location, not to mention beautiful one-bedroom living quarters bathed in natural light. Southern and eastern exposures from oversized windows, high beamed ceilings, generously-sized rooms and charming prewar details set this beauty apart. An entry foyer with oversized closets spills into the large, comfortable living and dining room. Make morning coffee or fine fare in the open windowed kitchen styled with updated finishes, stainless steel appliances and a breakfast bar. The king-size bedroom enjoys plentiful sunlight, substantial closet space, and a lovely tiled full bath that's windowed and en-suite. Built in 1928, 107 West 86th Street is a handsome prewar hi-rise that was converted to a cooperative in 1984. Residents are treated to amenities that include a full-time doorman, live-in super, central laundry room, bike room and private storage. The location is supreme, a block from Central Park, near great cafes & shops along Columbus & Broadway, within a block or 2 to the 1, B & C trains, M86 crosstown bus & Citi Bike stations. Most utilities are included in the monthly maintenance. Pied-a-terres and guarantors are permitted with board approval and the building is pet friendly. An assessment of $222.19 / month is in place until June 2022.

Prewar, Pristine, and Prime! Large One Bedroom Condo in highly desirable Upper West Side location at the corner of Columbus Ave and W 86th. This Bright and Welcoming Home, perched on the 11th floor, has Stunning Views, Abundant Sunlight, and Space to Relax or Entertain. Enter through a Gracious Foyer with a Charming Original Archway. A Spacious Living Room can accommodate a Desk/Office Setup and Sectional Couch. Sconces are wired in both walls. Solid Original Hardwood Floors are in Absolutely Perfect Condition. Dining Area is separated by handsome French Doors. Windowed Galley Kitchen gets Great Light. Bathroom has been renovated to match the Prewar Aesthetic with Classic Basket Weave Tile floors. Corner Bedroom has Oversized Windows featuring stunning Southern Views. Apartment has ample space for storage. Just one short block from Central Park, 110 West 86th Street Condominium is an Emery Roth building with elegant Lobby, Attentive Bldg. Staff (Full Time Doorman, Live-in Super), and impeccably maintained common areas. Pets are Welcomed. Very Convenient access to All Transportation, Quaint Shops, and the Neighborhood's Best Restaurants! There is a monthly assessment of $117.58 considered a reserve contribution that is in place to maintain the condo's strong financial health.

Diamond Bright Studio In The Historic "Rockville Tudor" Bldg. High Ceilings With Crown Moldings With Detailed Trims. Custom California Closets Unique Draperies And Wall Coverings Imported From France. Honey Onyx Bathroom With Pocket Door. 6" Reclaimed Wood Floors. Bike Rm, Updated Laundry Room Storage W/Unit .Great Location Close To Pubs, Stores Lirr And Restaurants.

Franklin Square Updated Brick One Family Home In School Dist 17, Features Include: Updated Kitchen, Updated Windows, Updated Bath, Hard Wood Flrs, 2 Fire Places, Finished Basement W Ose, Patio Area, Nicely Landscaped Private Back Yard W Deck, In-Ground Water Sprinklers, Also, A "2 Car Garage"! Near Rath Park, Schools, Major Roads And Shopping.

Welcome to 1255 Bushwick, a spectacular new boutique condominium development featuring unique studio, one- and two-bedroom residences located in the heart of the hottest borough's most talked about neighborhood. This historic structure has been flawlessly transformed with the integrity and detail of its vintage facade intact. Here, modern finishes blend flawlessly with expertly salvaged materials, offering the perfect combination of modern luxury and classic elegance.

This fantastic studio/1 bath residence features modern finishes and amazing, tree-lined views. The contemporary kitchen offers brilliant Lagos quartz countertops alongside custom double square cabinetry, Fisher & Paykel and Bosch stainless steel appliances with a Summit recirculating hood and a white porcelain farm style sink set against the classic white subway tile backsplash. Bathroom features include elegant Flash Bisel Blanco wall tile and Cementine black and white flooring, Aquabrass fixtures, Benoist reclaimed wood vanity and Duravit deep soaking bathtub for ultimate relaxation. Residence features include central heat/air, washer/dryer hookups, sleek track lighting, white oak hardwood floors, Unitone video intercoms and large windows allowing for great natural light. Building amenities include a landscaped second floor roof terrace, deeded parking spaces for sale and bike storage.

Take advantage of the burgeoning art scene, progressive restaurants and exciting nightlife existing minutes from your front door. Located just one block from the building, the JMZ trains at Halsey Street provide a swift commute into Manhattan.



Sponsor reserves the right to make changes in accordance with the terms of the offering plan. Sponsor reserves the right to make substitutions of material, equipment, fixtures, finishes, and appliances in accordance with the terms of the offering plan. The complete offering terms are in an offering plan available from Sponsor: 1255 Bushwick Avenue, LLC. , 308 Malcom X Blvd, Brooklyn, New York 11233.

Residence features include central heat/air, washer/dryer hookups, sleek track lighting, white oak hardwood floors, Unitone video intercoms and large windows allowing for great natural light. Building amenities include a landscaped second floor roof terrace, deeded parking spaces for sale and bike storage.


Take advantage of the burgeoning art scene, progressive restaurants and exciting nightlife existing minutes from your front door. Located just one block from the building, the JMZ trains at Halsey Street provide a swift commute into Manhattan.

Welcome to 1255 Bushwick, a spectacular new boutique condominium development featuring unique studio, one- and two-bedroom residences located in the heart of the hottest borough's most talked about neighborhood. This historic structure has been flawlessly transformed with the integrity and detail of its vintage facade intact. Here, modern finishes blend flawlessly with expertly salvaged materials, offering the perfect combination of modern luxury and classic elegance.


This 1 bed/1 bath residence receives exceptional light from brilliant exposures, and features open Manhattan skyline views out of floor-to-ceiling windows. The contemporary kitchen offers brilliant Lagos quartz countertops alongside custom double square cabinetry, Fisher & Paykel and Bosch stainless steel appliances with a Summit recirculating hood and a white porcelain farm style sink set against the classic white subway tile backsplash. First Open House 10/15 12:00-1:30. Sun-kissed and breathtakingly gorgeous corner 4 bedroom 3 bathroom home in mint condition with river views in one of RSD's most sought after and elegant buildings! Enter into a beautiful and cleverly designed foyer offering loads of storage space which perfectly frames the river views as soon as you open your door. Expansive and open floor plan offers loft-like living, dining and open kitchen, with four oversized windows overlooking Riverside Park, the Hudson River and beyond. The stunning and very spacious open chef's kitchen, which has high-end appliances, black granite countertops and a great use of space, will be the heart of this prewar gem. The large corner master bedroom/bathroom suite with a large walk-in closet offers S and W river views and a feeling of tranquility. Three additional spacious bedrooms and two lovely bathrooms make this the perfect home. An additional hidden bedroom with a Murphy bed between the front hall and kitchen is great for extra guests. Beautiful and mainly original wood floors, ten foot beamed ceilings, prewar details and a decorative onyx fireplace turn this sunny corner apartment into a warm and welcoming home with river views, sunshine, privacy and quiet. Vented washer dryer, filtered water system, loads of closets and storage space. Premier Full service 24 hour doorman building with gym, playroom and bike room.

The brand new full service luxury condominium 135 W. 52nd Street is located in the heart of Manhattan just steps away from Central Park, Times Square, Radio City Music Hall, New York's famous theatre district, St. Patrick's Cathedral, Rockefeller Center, MOMA Museum, the world renowned 5th Avenue shopping paradise and a plethora of fine dining establishements. Residents will find themselves pampered by an incredible level of service and building amenities. Other features include: solid oak plank floors, W/D, recessed lighting and separately controlled HVAC systems. The building also offers all residents an unparalleled level of amenities through its 12,000 square foot private facility located on the 7th floor including: a lounge, private dining room, media room, children¡¦s playroom, fitness center with sauna and steam rooms and a golf simulator. Residents will also have use of a swimming pool located in the lower level. Other building services include a 24 hour doorman, full time concierge and live-in resident manager. A separate parking garage is conveniently located right next to the building's entrance.

This exceptional 3,726 square foot 3-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom residence with library, four-way exposures, and a 153 square foot private terrace occupies an entire floor at 135 West 52nd Street, the coveted condominium situated in the heart of Midtown Manhattan, expertly conceived by esteemed CetraRuddy to reflect the glamour and energy of New York City.

Rich finishes and luxurious design elements abound, including rift-sawn 5 inch-wide plank white oak flooring throughout, while generous proportions and abundant light through massive exposures that offer views of Central Park and the Hudson River create a spacious, open feel. Keyed elevators open to a private vestibule with separate service and primary entrances. Through the residential entry, a massive 50-foot wide Great Room awaits, the southern wall lined almost entirely in glass for incredible natural light and quintessential City views. Within the space, multiple living and dining areas create the ideal setting for gracious entertaining and luxurious daily living alike, while elegant touches include a beautiful fireplace enclosed in floor-to-ceiling marble. Adjacent to the great room at the eastern end, opposite the wet bar, custom Rimadesio white back-painted glass sliding doors reveal a sumptuous Library, wrapped on two sides by south- and east-facing exposures.

At the west end, the great room flows into the gracious eat-in chef's Kitchen, where glass lines the southwest corner, setting the perfect scene for intimate dining. The elegantly appointed Molteni kitchen offers Italian walnut and custom white back-painted glass cabinetry, Calacatta Vision marble countertops, and top-of-the-line Miele appliances that include dual dishwashers, a built-in icemaker, coffee maker, and wine refrigerator. A powder room and utility closet with Miele washer and dryer complete this truly outstanding residence.

The private Master Suite promises a luxurious daily retreat, where a sprawling, light-filled master bedroom opens to a 153 square foot private terrace, the ultimate setting in which to unwind. Beyond the dual closets are two Master Baths with radiant heat flooring, one with commode and beautiful custom vanity and the other with a north-facing window, custom vanity with ample counter space, a freestanding Kaldewei soaking tub, and private water closet joined together by a shared shower. A powder room and utility closet with Miele washer and dryer complete this truly outstanding residence.

IMMEDIATE OCCUPANCY! Gracious 2,121 square foot, three bedroom, 3 bath residence with Northern, Eastern, and Southern exposures features a huge 420 square foot private terrace evokes a modern sensibility and paramount comfort. Interior features include rift-sawn 5 inch wide white solid oak flooring, exposures on three sides, and custom Rimadesio back-painted white glass sliding walls. An elegant foyer leads to a gracious corner Great Room that offers Southern and Eastern exposures.

The Great Room flows seamlessly into an Open Chef's Kitchen, creating a perfect layout for entertaining. The Kitchen features Dada Italian Walnut and custom white back-painted glass cabinetry, and a Dada high-gloss white lacquer island complete with a speed oven and wine refrigerator. Calacatta Vision marble counter tops and top-of-the-line Miele appliances finish of this stunning kitchen. The beautiful Master Suite includes a large walk-in-closet as well as a dressing room.

The Master Bath includes radiant-heated, Siberian White tile floors, custom white, back-painted glass vanity with a polished nickel frame and Siberian Mink stone countertop, Fantini Venezia wall-mounted polished nickel fixtures, custom recessed medicine cabinet a soaking tub and a stall shower. The second and third bedrooms each feature en suite bathrooms, appointed with Calacatta marble tile walls, custom Watermark polished nickel wall-mounted tub and shower fittings, and polished Bianco Dolomiti countertops, complete with white ceramic under mount Nantucket sinks. A side-by-side washer and dryer by Miele finish of this remarkable residence.

IMMEDIATE OCCUPANCY! The exceptional three-bedroom, three-and-one-half bath Duplex Penthouse comprises 2,601 interior square feet with 306 square feet of private terrace space as well as a stunning quadruple exposures and two floors, all in the very heart of Midtown Manhattan at 135 W 52nd Street.

Soaring ceilings, custom white back painted glass cabinetry, and an exquisite palette of luxurious design elements create a sophisticated sensibility in this stunning residence. Triple exposures bathe the Dining/ Family Room in natural sunlight while rift-sawn 5-wide plank white oak flooring creates warmth and texture that extends into the adjoining open Chef's Kitchen.

Molteni Italian walnut and custom white back-painted glass cabinetry with bronze satin mirror detailing, Calacatta Vision polished marble countertop, Watermark fixtures, and premiere appliances by Miele adorn the open kitchen. Beyond, a glass-wrapped, double-height Great Room offers an ideal setting for daily living and entertaining alike, and Southern- and Eastern exposures provide warm natural light and stunning city skyline views.

At the East end of the first level lies the gracious Library, featuring an en suite full bath with custom Watermark polished nickel shower fittings and Calacatta honed marble tile flooring, the eastern wall of the Library is made entirely of glass and leads out to one of the residence's spacious private terraces. A secondary bedroom with en suite bath and a Powder Room expertly appointed with custom walnut vanity with a polished nickel metal frame and Calacatta Fab polished marble counter tops complete this level.

The upstairs private Master Suite promises a luxurious daily retreat, where a sprawling, light-filled master bedroom opens to a 153 square foot private terrace, the ultimate setting in which to unwind. Beyond the dual closets are two Master Baths with radiant heat flooring, one with commode and beautiful custom vanity and the other with a north-facing window, custom vanity with ample counter space, a freestanding Kaldewei soaking tub, and private water closet joined together by a shared shower. A Utility Closet with Miele washer and dryer complete this beautiful residence.

Come see this spacious 1-bedroom apartment in one of Murray Hill's loveliest Art Deco buildings. Featuring both north and south exposures, and prewar details, this lovely home offers a king-sized bedroom with garden views, updated windowed kitchen and bath, refinished floors, excellent closet space, and high, beamed ceilings. This well managed co-op, offers a central laundry room, live-in super, part-time security guard, fully furnished and landscaped roof deck with stunning views of the Empire State Building, as well as, both bike storage and personal storage. Conveniently located within minutes of Grand Central Station, countless dining, shopping, and nightlife options and everything else that the East Side of Manhattan has to offer. Pied-a-terres, co-purchasing and gifting are all permitted. No dogs. Please contact us for an appointment.

Brand New to the Market! Landmark Lofty Gem near City Hall Park boasts soaring ceilings, a remarkable 65 foot long living/dining room, dazzling light and views from 23 oversized windows, newly installed Central A/C, beautiful hardwood floors, prewar details and grand space of approximately 2,800 square feet. This amazing home opens into an expansive and luminous open-concept living room, dining room, family room (easily 3rd bedroom) and kitchen. The living and dining spaces are lined with 18 huge windows, while the kitchen is equipped with an eat-in island, custom cabinetry and a suite of fully integrated stainless steel appliances from Miele, Viking and Sub-Zero. There is a gorgeous master suite with walk through closet and ensuite bathroom, as well as a spacious 2nd bedroom with dedicated full bath. Ceiling height of 10'8" combined with enormous windows offer south, east and west exposures plus exceptional light and views of the Manhattan skyline and East River. Enjoy fantastic views of the Woolworth Building, City Hall Park, the recently restored and magnificent Temple Court/Beekman Hotel, Freedom Tower, and a peek of the Calatrava designed transportation Hub. Schedule a private appointment to view this truly special new offering.
The Building:Once one of the city's tallest buildings, the Morse building (of Morse Code fame) dating to 1879 is a Landmark Cooperative with beautifully landscaped roof deck offering panoramic views, an old world mosaic tiled lobby, full time dedicated Super, is pet friendly, allows 80% financing, and the maintenance is 71% tax deductible. Additionally, there is bike storage and large individual storage lockers, when available. The facade features Romanesque style arches and a Victorian Gothic contrast of red and black brick above the windows. An early tenant was the American Vitagraph Company, who in 1898 created a film studio on the roof. (Assessment of $618.76).
The Neighborhood:Prominently located just east of City Hall Park and Tribeca...nearby to Brookfield Place luxury shopping/dining complex, the Winter Garden Atrium, the Oculus Transportation Hub and multi-level retail space, and the newly revitalized South Street Seaport...140 Nassau captures the very essence of living in the center of one of the world's most exciting neighborhoods. With numerous transportation and education options, superb restaurants such as Nobu, Tom Colicchio's Temple Court, Keith McNally's Augustine, just to name a few, this is truly a vibrant, relevant area and best described as the "center of the new downtown" - an ideal choice of neighborhood to live in!

Bespoke Chelsea Live/Work Condo Loft features enormous south facing living room, giant bedrooms, towering ceilings, huge windows, gourmet open kitchen with externally vented hood, private laundry and a large separate windowed work space perfect for architect, designer, family office, tech, finance, etc. Very affordable monthlies! 144 is a well maintained discrete condominium with two large elevators, full-time superintendent perfectly located in Chelsea, steps from NoMad and the Flatiron District. Amazing restaurants, nightlife and entertainment options are right outside. Please note there is an assessment of $670 per month through the end of the year.

Mint condition two bedroom two bath floor-thru in historic townhouse with open modern kitchen, hardwood floors and Italian marble fireplace. This newly renovated home features an open chefs kitchen with stainless steel appliances, custom cabinets, granite counter and dishwasher. A generous dining area is perfect for hosting friends or a quiet dinner for two. The generous living area is perfect for spreading out after a long day and curling up with a good book. Your master suite faces south over manicured gardens with amazing light pouring in throughout the day and absolute peace and quiet. .An ensuite bath is the perfect respite from your busy city life. A large second bedroom is the prefect guest room, office or nursery. This intimate co-op has complimentary on-site laundry and common storage. Located at the crossroads of Greenwich Village, Chelsea and the Flatiron District, Union Square, the Meatpacking District, the West Village, Westside Market, Whole Foods and Trader Joes are minutes away. The F/M subway is a block away, the 1/2/3 and every other subway in the city are each blocks away. Michelin rated restaurants, fantastic shopping and entertainment are all right outside.

Brand New To Market! The Paradigm is very aptly named for this boutique luxury condominium loft building located in the heart of Chelsea. Apartment 7 boasts a full floor of elegance with an open and expansive living/entertaining space for the modern lifestyle.This stunning 3 bedroom 3 bathroom condo is gorgeously renovated and in mint condition. The private, keyed elevator opens up to a welcoming foyer that sets the tone for this luxury condo. The huge kitchen is a chef's dream outfitted with Subzero Refrigerator, Subzero dual temp wine refrigerator, Viking range, Bosch dishwasher, gorgeous Poggen-pohl cabinetry, granite countertops and dining counter open to the loft space. The enormous master and second bedrooms both enjoy their own private balconies and en-suite bathrooms each with soaking tubs, separate showers and Toto toilets. The third bedroom and bathroom is privately situated off the living room. Central A/C, a washer/ dryer and plentiful closets top off this this beautiful, turn key apartment which comes with a 100 Square foot storage room. The Paradigm also has a lovely roof deck with gorgeous open City views. Excellent location close to all major transportation lines, Trader Joe's/ Whole Foods /Eataly / Chelsea Market and accessible to all downtown fabulous shopping and restaurants. Easily Shown by appointment.

Sprawling mint condition, one bedroom + home office condominium loft with two full bathrooms, soaring ceilings, chef's kitchen, central air and sought after western exposure. Upon entering you will be captivated by the shear grandeur of this home. Delight in views of the New York Stock Exchange through your massive windows which allow light to pour in. This apartment also boasts numerous closets, private washer/dryer and plenty of room to entertain guests and find respite from the Manhattan hustle. 15 Broad is a full-service, amenity-rich building which offers a 24-hour doorman, indoor swimming pool, fitness center, basketball court, concierge, children's play room, dance studio, bowling alley, outdoor terrace, and access to transportation and world-class restaurants. Interiors by Philippe Stark, no detail was overlooked

Location.StreetIntersection: Bet. Beaver St and Exchange Pl

BasicDetails.Description:
15 William is a modern and sophisticated condominium residence. It is distinctive and contemporary from the outside; modern, warm and inviting on the inside, with lifestyle amenities rivaling New York's finest residential buildings and luxury hotels.

Situated on southern point of the building, this well-designed split two bedroom, two bathroom E-line residence measuring 1,300 square feet features spectacular views of downtown New York's iconic architecture and water views of New York Harbor. Brilliant streaming light pours in through the expansive 8'2" double-glazed windows with southern, and eastern exposures.

The flowing Layout begins with an Entry Foyer with walk-in coat closet that opens to a spacious Great Room with a wraparound wall of windows facing to the east and south allowing for gorgeous views and beaming light throughout the day. The open chef's Kitchen boasts custom designed white lacquer and stainless steel cabinetry, Ceaserstone counter and backsplash and Blanco stainless steel sink with Vola satin nickel faucets. The high-end appliances include fully-integrated Sub Zero 700 series refrigerator/freezer and Miele Incognito dishwasher, as well as Miele gas cook top and convection oven. Additional features include integrated stainless steel hoods, dimmable cabinet lighting, as well as garbage disposal.

The spacious Master Bedroom suite offers stunning architectural views, a large walk-in closet and a smaller second closet. Indulge in the well-appointed Master Bath with exquisitely crafted custom Corian vanity with mirror surround, generous double medicine cabinet with integrated lighting, oversized deep soaking tub, and a separate rain shower and Toto Carolina water closet enclosure. The large Second Bedroom also features stunning southern water views and great light through the same over-sized windows with an adjacent second bathroom.

This sleek, contemporary residence features 9'8" ceiling heights, warm Burmese Teak flooring throughout, a built-in home office, Asko washer/dryer, multi-zone climate control system providing heat and AC all year round, high-speed internet, cable television and abundant storage and closet space.

Unrivaled amenities include a stunning resident's penthouse lounge with wraparound landscaped terrace, private children's playground, professional screening room, covered dog run, onsite valet parking and Abigail Michael's concierge services. Nearly 18,000 square feet of space is devoted to fitness and exercise including a natural-light filled fitness center with state-of-the-art strength and cardio equipment, indoor 50' heated salt water lap pool, outdoor hot tub, sauna and steam rooms, outdoor half-court basketball, indoor squash court and yoga studio.

Perfectly situated, 15 William Street is a ground-up 320 unit, 47-story luxury high-rise in the heart of the Financial District, surrounded by architectural jewels of the past centuries, chic shopping destinations, sumptuous dining, and all that Downtown's most exciting neighborhood has to offer. Residents also enjoy quick access to many transit options: 2,3,4,5,6,R subways, bus routes, PATH, Citi Bike stations and NY Water Taxi.

421-A tax abatement in effect through 2019. Sponsor sale. Immediate Occupancy. File No. CD-06-0330.

Location.StreetIntersection: Bet. Beaver St and Exchange Pl

Located at the end of the hall , the "floor-through" design allows for bright morning light from the east and late-afternoon sun from the west through the expansive 8'2" double-glazed windows.

The flowing split bedroom layout begins with a large Entry Foyer that opens to a spacious Living Area to the right or the separate Kitchen and Dining Area to the left. The Living Area is large enough to accommodate formal dining or be used as a home office space if desired. Additional features include integrated stainless steel hoods, dimmable cabinet lighting, as well as garbage disposal.

The spacious Master Bedroom suite, facing east and separate from the Second Bedroom, offers stunning architectural views, a large walk-in closet and a smaller second closet. Indulge in the well-appointed Master Bath with exquisitely crafted custom Corian vanity with mirror surround, generous double medicine cabinet with integrated lighting, oversized deep soaking tub, and a separate rain shower and Toto Carolina water closet enclosure. The separate Second Bedroom faces west and also features the same over-sized windows with an adjacent well-appointed second bathroom with tub.

BasicDetails.Description:
15 William is a modern and sophisticated condominium residence. It is distinctive and contemporary from the outside; modern, warm and inviting on the inside, with lifestyle amenities rivaling New York's finest residential buildings and luxury hotels.

This smart and efficiently designed alcove studio, D-line residence, measuring a spacious 698 square feet, offers great views of downtown New York's iconic architecture and stunning water views. Beautiful light pours in through the expansive double-glazed 8'2" windows with southeastern exposures overlooking historically landmarked streets.

The loft-style residence begins with an Entry Foyer that flows to an open Kitchen and then into the expansive Living Area with spacious Alcove. Adjacent to the Kitchen is a custom built-in home office that maximizes space and can easily be concealed. The chef's Kitchen boasts custom designed white lacquer and stainless steel cabinetry, Ceaserstone counter and backsplash and Blanco stainless steel sink with Vola satin nickel faucets. The high-end appliances include fully-integrated Liebherr refrigerator/freezer and Miele Incognito dishwasher, as well as Miele gas cook top and convection oven. Additional features include integrated stainless steel hoods, dimmable cabinet lighting, as well as garbage disposal.

Indulge in the well-appointed Master Bath with exquisitely crafted custom Corian vanity with mirror surround, generous double medicine cabinet with integrated lighting, oversized deep soaking tub, and a separate rain shower and Toto Carolina water closet enclosure.

This sleek, contemporary residence features 9'8? ceiling heights, warm Burmese Teak flooring throughout, a built-in home office, Asko washer/dryer, multi-zone climate control system providing heat and AC all year round, high-speed internet, cable television and abundant storage and closet space.

Unrivaled amenities include a stunning resident's penthouse lounge with wraparound landscaped terrace, private children's playground, professional screening room, covered dog run, onsite valet parking and Abigail Michael's concierge services. Nearly 18,000 square feet of space is devoted to fitness and exercise including a natural-light filled fitness center with state-of-the-art strength and cardio equipment, indoor 50' heated salt water lap pool, outdoor hot tub, sauna and steam rooms, outdoor half-court basketball, indoor squash court and yoga studio.

Perfectly situated, 15 William Street is a ground-up 320 unit, 47-story luxury high-rise in the heart of the Financial District, surrounded by architectural jewels of the past centuries, chic shopping destinations, sumptuous dining, and all that Downtown's most exciting neighborhood has to offer. Residents also enjoy quick access to many transit options: 2,3,4,5,6,R subways, bus routes, PATH, Citi Bike stations and NY Water Taxi.

421-A tax abatement in effect through 2019. Sponsor sale. Immediate Occupancy. File No. CD-06-0330.

The impressive 21' ceiling height in the Living Room with a full floor-to-ceiling wall of windows, opens up to a spacious private outdoor Terrace measuring 295 square feet. Perfect for entertaining both inside and outside.

The chef's Kitchen boasts custom designed white lacquer and stainless steel cabinetry, Ceaserstone counter and backsplash and Blanco stainless steel sink with Vola satin nickel faucets. Well maintained home located near beach. Sited on .35 acre heated pool, spa, outdoor shower, deck for entertaining. Home features soaring ceilings in great room, light filled with hardwood floors, fireplace custom lighting, built ins. Eat in kitchen, 4 bedrooms 3.5 baths. Enjoy home theater, wine cellar, entertaining areas lower level.

Welcome Home! After a day of conquering Manhattan, arriving home to this pin-drop quiet beauty will be a delight in every way. This one bedroom is a lovely space with a stylish character uniquely its own. The perfectly planned one bedroom CONDO is a serene, bright residence in the heart of the Upper West Side. Entertaining is seamless in this inviting living room which enjoys the view of an enchanting prosperity fountain and leafy green foliage beneath your window. The kitchen with its slate floor, custom cabinetry with glass doors, stainless steel appliances and granite counter space is perfect for bringing out your inner chef! The adjacent dining area comfortably seats 4-6. Relax and unwind in the tranquil bedroom while listening to soothing water trickling from the water feature beneath. An ensuite bathroom includes a large dressing room complete with custom storage and shelving. A welcoming foyer with incredible closet space, crown and base moldings, and gleaming wood floors complete this special residence. The Dorchester Towers, a full service luxury building enjoys a beautifully landscaped circular driveway, 24 hour doorman and concierge, supremely attentive live in resident manager, beautifully renovated lobby, planted roof deck, fitness center, conference center and bike room. Walk to Trader Joe's, 1, 2, 3 subways and buses, shops and terrific restaurants. Laundry is conveniently located on each floor. Great INVESTMENT opportunity too with flexible sublease. Walk to Lincoln Center, Central Park and Riverside Park too!

South facing Upper West Side condominium. This one bedroom home is located in a full service building that is in close proximity to Lincoln Center, Central Park, multiple subway lines and some of the finest shopping and restaurants on the UWS. The living room and bedroom receive nice South facing light and offer views of the landscaping of W 68th St. There is ample closet space and a separate kitchen that can easily become your ideal chefs kitchen. This apt is in good condition and is priced to sell. There is an ongoing assessment of $111.22 for this unit.Dorchester Towers is a full service building with full time doormen, live in super, storage, roof deck, parking, laundry on each floor, and a bike room.

Unbeatable price and seller paying six months of maintenance for buyer!! It's time to make offers!

The Essex House is an iconic New York hotel / condo situated directly across from Central Park on Central Park South. This bright and large one bedroom apartment perched on the 31st floor is located in the coveted tower of the hotel. Its placement on a high floor allows abundant sunlight all day from its seven south-facing windows.

When you enter this apartment, you immediately notice the sunlight that pours in through the south-facing windows. The foyer leads to the living/dining area that features two walk-in closets and then enters into the large living space with an adjoining, windowed kitchen. The generously sized bedroom, features a large closet, and an en suite bathroom with soaking tub. This apartment also features original herringbone floors, dental crown molding, central heat/air, and overhead lighting.

Calling the Essex House home comes with many benefits. Surrounded by amazing shops, restaurants, and entertainment within Columbus Circle and Lincoln Square, and the very special Central Park. As a resident, you have access to all of the amenities of the hotel including valet laundry, dry cleaning, room service, maid's service, and a full time concierge team for condominium owners. Additionally, there is a health club, event space, and restaurant. The Essex House condominiums may be used as investments and be rented for minimum 1 month terms, with no board approval required.

Featuring 1,600 square feet of outdoor space split between a brand new roof deck and backyard, we invite you to the elevator townhouse, a brownstone originally built in 1910 and reimagined in 2017.The residence encompasses 6,900 square feet over 6 livable floors with 6 oversized bedrooms, en-suite marble baths with radiant heat, and walk-in closets in each. There are 2 wood burning fireplaces, steam room and an entertainment level wet bar.The generous proportions and design have an organized elegance that you might not find elsewhere. Incredibly high ceilings, and new windows with the original window shutters frame each bedroom. On the top floor, we have added a wall of southern windows which has a protected view, and is a wonderful game room. The brand new fifth floor leads up to a new glass bulkhead with additional storage in the vestibule to the roof deck.The open Chef's Kitchen is splendid in all four seasons as light emanates from the backyard on the garden level. Featuring double Sub-Zero refrigerators, white kitchen island, and windowed cabinets. The Wolf range and ventilated hood has an Artistic tile backsplash. Featuring a Miele dishwasher, and a dual function speed convection oven / micro, the island also doubles as a countertop architecturally designed for a casual dining. A folding wall of windows is easy to open to create an outdoor feel when dining in your eat-in kitchen.The renovation added 2,200 square feet to this home adding depth and height. There is new plumbing, 18 zone heating, 4 zone central AC, new sprinklers, new windows, and nothing has been left without careful consideration.

A perfect West Side Story! Welcome Home to this lovely spacious alcove studio (convertible one bedroom) just steps away from Lincoln Center, Central Park, and Riverside Park. Perched up high on the 25th floor, this pin drop quiet and sunshine filled living room (with an adjacent dining area together with room for home office) is an ideal space boasting four gigantic picture windows framing gorgeous blue skies. The sleeping alcove with dressing area offers a custom Murphy Bed and built in storage. The renovated kitchen with ample custom cabinetry, beautiful onyx granite countertops and premium appliances is perfect for bringing out your inner chef! Spacious closets (including a walk-in) and gleaming wood floors complete this residence. Here, in this prime Lincoln Square location, 160 West End Avenue enjoys 24 hour doorman, supremely attentive super, gym, dry cleaning, play room, laundry, bike storage, and access to Lincoln Towers own perfectly private park. Pet friendly too. Low maintenance includes gas & electricity! Walk to 1,2,3 subways and buses, shops, and terrific restaurants. You too can have your own perfect West Side Story.

OPEN HOUSE IS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY!
PLEASE DO NOT JUST SHOW UP AT THE BUILDING!

This mint, 4 bedroom prewar condo conversion offers luxury living with original details.

The fabulous windowed kitchen is open to the formal dining room and offers custom cabinets, white glass countertops, marble back splash, and top-of-the-line appliances such as Miele, Bertazonni, Fischer Paykal, and Bosch. The 4 bedrooms have plenty of closet space, and the large sun-flooded living room and master bedroom both face South. The 3.5 windowed luxurious bathrooms are pristinely renovated with custom vanities, polished nickel hardware and a stunning combination of stone and glass. Additional features of this gorgeous home include central air conditioning, new windows, washer/dryer, wine cooler, sound system and new solid oak floors.

165 West 91st Street is a rare prewar condo that offers a full-time doorman, resident manager, a fabulous landscaped roof garden, fitness room, bike room, a kid's playroom, plus a meticulously restored lobby with new bronze doors and cold storage. The building is close to the 1, 2 and 3 subway lines and half way between Riverside Park and Central Park. Plenty of restaurants, supermarkets and stores are close by.

Triple mint Tribeca penthouse two bedroom condominium with two and a half baths, twenty-four doorman and working wood-burning fireplace. Towering over Duane Park with spectacular views from City Hall to the Empire State through massive eight foot tall windows, incredible light pours in throughout the day. Greet guests in your over-sized entry foyer and lead them into an enormous living area where they will be in awe of incredible ceiling heights and fantastic proportions. The expertly designed kitchen is perfect for entertaining in that its open while hiding meal preparation and clean up. Facing east, a comfortable master suite easily fits a king-sized bed. Two large walk-in closets provide plentiful storage. The master bath has a deep soaking tub, separate glass enclosed shower with rain shower head, custom vanity and separate water closet. The second bedroom is on the opposite side of the home and provides complete privacy with its own ensuite bath. 166 is a pet friendly boutique condominium with private roof deck for residents, full-time doorman and superintendent. Perfectly located right on historic Duane Park, acclaimed restaurants Forgione and Locanda Verde are but a couple of the neighborhood stapes. Whole Foods, The World Trade Center, Oculus and Brookfield Place are minutes from your front door. The 1/2 and 3 trains are right downstairs while the A/C/E/N/R/4/5/6 are reached easily.

Situated in one of NYC's finest luxury buildings this 1400 SF 2 bedroom 2.5 bath has endless possibilities. Upon entering the unit you find yourself in a wide foyer leading to a large living and separate dining space. A wall of windows, and southern exposure provides plenty of sunshine throughout. There is an abundance of closet space, in unit washer/dryer permitted and each bedroom has it's own en suite bath. With a little TLC this is your chance to own in one the city's most exciting neighborhoods! You are only minutes away from the best shopping, dining and entertainment.

Building amenities include fulltime attended lobby, garage parking, gym, and outdoor garden.*NOTE! Building no longer has a land lease!!

Truly special Fieldstone Colonial situated on a quiet cul-de-sac on New Rochelle/Larchmont border in sought-after location less than one mile to Metro-North, shops and restaurants. Gracious home elegantly renovated with a keen eye to preserving its original details and 1930s character. Inviting, freshly painted interior highlighted by hardwood floors, classic millwork, and sunny exposures. Main living areas include large living room with brick fireplace and built-ins; enclosed porch sliders to private yard; formal dining room; and a spacious eat-in-kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, center island, and adjoining breakfast/family room. Second floor provides wonderful master suite with copious closets and master bath, two additional bedrooms and hall bath, PLUS guest bedroom and full bath on FIRST LEVEL. Lower level offers recreation room with fireplace, playroom, powder room, utility room, laundry room with walk-out to property, and access to 1-car garage.

INCREDIBLE PENTHOUSE DUPLEX CONDO WITH THREE TERRACES! Bask in the breathtaking cityscape from this one of a kind sun splashed 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath duplex offering THREE TERRACES perched up high on the 21st and 22nd floors in the heart of the Upper East Side totaling almost 2350 sq. feet. Enter this beautiful oasis in the sky through an entryway (perfect space to display art) that leads you to a bright, spacious and inviting living room, ideal for relaxation or seamless entertaining. Relish in the warm glow of the setting sun while sipping cocktails or dining alfresco on your enormous 400 sq. ft. terrace, plenty of room for two seating areas and your own rooftop herb garden. Even the kitchen has a view through its oversized window and enjoys ample countertops and cabinets galore, perfect for bringing out your inner chef! An additional windowed powder room completes this level and ensures easy entertaining. Upstairs, the tranquil master suite boasts a huge walk in closet and TWO private terraces with unobstructed open sky on the northern intimate terrace (perfect to enjoy your morning coffee) or relax and unwind under the stars illuminating the night sky on your private 400 sq. foot southern terrace. The Zen inspired bath indulges you with a deep soaking tub and separate shower. The second bedroom (ideal for a library or home office) is equally inviting boasting access to the southern terrace as well. A third spacious bedroom also enjoys these incredible unique north and south exposures. Glorious light, gleaming hardwood herringbone floors, granite bathrooms, large closets and a washer dryer complete this incredible residence. The Gotham Condo is ideally located in the heart of Carnegie Hill, one of Manhattan's most desirable neighborhoods. Desirably situated just off Lexington Avenue, Penthouse 21B is the extraordinary embodiment of sleek, innovative, and unique design. Exclusive amenities include: 24-hour doorman and concierge, supremely attentive super, a fully-equipped fitness center, 80 foot heated pool and sauna, children's playroom, party room with full catering kitchen, outdoor garden, and a bike room. Walk to Whole Foods and Fairway, subways (4,5,6 and Q), buses, restaurants and shopping. The building allows investors, Pied-a-terres, co-purchasing, gifting, sublets. Luxury living at its finest.Please tour this special property by clicking on the following:https://h5property.com/tour/listings/DE2871828/h5tour.html

ATTENTION ALL TERRACE LOVERS! 1st offering in over 50 years of this expansive 2bedroom/2bath home with a spectacular 375 SF terrace. Located on a high floor of a premier Coop building West of Third Avenue, Apt. 16E welcomes you into a gracious entry foyer leading to a sun filled grand living room. A glass door opens to the East facing private terrace with lovely city views. The flowing layout consists of 2 separate bedroom wings with many walk in closets. The large Master bedroom faces East with an en-suite bath room. The equally large 2nd bedroom enjoys a Western city view. A 2nd bath is ideally located in the corridor outside this bedroom, making it easily accessible for guests. The windowed kitchen is a blank canvas for you to customize to meet your own personal needs. Washer/ dryers are allowed with Board approval. With a little creativity, this rare terraced residence can be transformed into your dream home!

174 East 74th Street is situated on a lovely tree lined street, West of Third Avenue. It features a 24 hour Doorman, live in Supt., handyman, laundry room, bicycle storage, storage room and a small garage. It is close to all transportation, including the Lexington Ave. subway, new Second Ave. subway and cross town buses. There are many fine restaurants, great shopping, and public and private schools nearby. It is in close proximity to Central Park.

One small dog up to 18" tall is allowed. Subletting is not permitted. There is a monthly assessment of $445. through Dec. 2017.

Your search is over! Unit 9D is spacious and immaculate 3 Bedroom + home office(Conv. to 4th BR)/3.5 Bathroom home perfectly situated on the corner of 3Rd Ave. and 62nd Street. Boasting over 2,300 square feet of sun drenched living space, this stunning residence is truly a HOME! Enter through a grand foyer leading you to a south-facing living room and den with tons of natural light. Opposite to the living room, you will find a functionally designed formal Dining Room with easy access to the kitchen featuring top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, plenty of counter & cabinet space and a Washer/Dryer. On a separate wing you'll find 2 bedrooms; a spacious master which hosts 2 large walk-in closets as well as a beautiful windowed en-suite bathroom and a 2nd bedroom with it's own en-suite bath. This home is in good move in condition but can be easily tweaked to personalize to your own taste and needs.
The Victorian is a full-service building with a 24-hour doorman, and laundry room. Unbeatable proximity to public transportation, just moments from 4/5/6/N/Q/R/F/M/E trains.
* Pictures are virtually staged. Please note alternate floorplan.

Introducing 1790 Third Avenue, The Cereza! This brand new beautifully crafted boutique condominium with a collection of 52 units houses studios to 2 bedrooms . All of the residences were uniquely crafted with the highest quality materials and prudent attention to detail. Each home in The Cereza features: Floor to ceiling windows, wonderful views , 6-inch white oak hardwood floors, a washer/dryer, Caesarstone Calacatta Nuvo kitchen countertops with Bosch stainless steel appliances, Calacatta porcelain bathrooms with Duravit white gloss vanity with Grohe fixtures and Moen accessories. Truly rare, the park views from the building are unobstructed and protected making this a diamond in the rough. An absolute amazing investment opportunity with unparalleled price points for new developments in the city with low common charges and taxes.

Apartment 205 is an oversized, East-facing studio with a functional layout for comfortable living with views of the cherry trees of Cherry Tree Park across Third Avenue ? beautiful all year round, but a truly special treat in the spring when the trees are in full bloom.The Cereza Condominiums is nestled between parks and perfectly located between the Second Avenue and Lexington Avenue subway lines for ample transportation convenience. In addition, it provides easy accessibility to the finest in culture, dining and recreation. The silver facade introduces a prominent contemporary presence to the tree-lined New York City Avenue and a welcoming lobby entrance defined by warm tones and textures creating a peaceful transition away from the city streets. The building offers its residents a virtual doorman, a bike room, and a private rooftop terrace, which enjoys panoramic views of historic neighborhoods and canopy trees.

Welcome to apartment #19 at 181 Thompson Street where The Greenwich Village meets Soho! Perched on the fourth floor, this charming two-bedroom offers a bright, quiet retreat. High ceilings, pass through windowed kitchen, crown molding, and windowed bathroom showcase this apartment's quaint features. Upon entering, one is delighted in the open kitchen with white exposed brick walls and wooden shelving. Through the kitchen's pass through window and into the living room the two large windows facing Thompson Street beam sunlight throughout the home. On your left you'll find both bedrooms creating an easy layout ? both bedrooms detailing exposed red brick, tons of sunlight and narrow plank hardwood flooring. The bathrooms with large windows bringing in natural light make this home extra special! Currently the only two-bedroom home under $1M in Greenwich Village, you don't want to miss it.

181 Thompson Street located in Greenwich Village embodies all the quintessential charm of this historic neighborhood. A six-story, walk-up building with intercom and part-time super. Dream location near Washington Square Park, all the winsome cafes and restaurants in Greenwich Village, and a short walk to shopping in Soho. Conveniently close to many subway lines. Co-op allows co-purchasing and guarantors. Best part, co-op allows for unlimited subletting from day one making this home perfect for an end-user or investor.

This beautifully renovated turnkey two bedroom is the best deal in Ditmas! Move right into this well-configured, rarely available garden level apartment and never carry your groceries far again as this apartment boasts a private exterior entrance. This corner unit features windows in every room with southern and eastern exposures which look out onto recently refurbished common green space. Be the first to break in the brand new hardwood floors that flow throughout. The bright living area flows into the eat-in kitchen which features custom-fit cabinets, stainless appliances including dishwasher, refrigerator, range/oven and hood, butcher block countertops, tile backsplash and floor. The amply sized bathroom with window sports all new subway tile, tub, sink and vanity and fixtures. Both bedrooms can accommodate a queen-size bed. The building has strong financials and an active board, a live-in super, full-time porters, package room, & part-time doorman, updated common courtyard and patio area, parking garage (fee), bike room, newly improved laundry down the hall from the unit, and a stylish updated lobby. Just two short blocks away from Newkirk Plaza (B/Q trains) and near local hangouts including Ox Cart and Milk and Honey on Newkirk Ave. Stroll three lovely sycamore-lined blocks down to Cortelyou Road where you'll find a year-round farmers market, shopping, and well known restaurants, bars, and cafes such as Mimi's Hummus, Café Madeleine, Lea, Qathra, and Purple Yam. Take a short bike ride via the neighborhood's bike lanes to Brooklyn's crown jewel outdoor space, Prospect Park with barbecue areas, the Lefrak Center at Lakeside, hiking and year-round festivals and green markets. Low monthly maintenance!

This 1600 sq foot renovated 3 Bedroom 3 Bath apartment is located in the best Upper East Side location on a beautiful block. The apartment faces North and South and has excellent light throughout the day. The Master Bedroom is on one side of the apartment and the 2nd and 3rd bedrooms have their own private wing. This is a really wonderful layout for a family. The kitchen has been renovated and has a pass thru to the Living Room. The Living Room has built ins and faces 70th Street. There are 3 marble bathrooms and Washer/Dryer. The floors in all 3 Bedrooms have just been redone.The building has a Concierge and doorman, gym, entertainment room with kitchen and the largest children's playroom in the "Big Apple". You are steps from shops, restaurants and convenient transportation. Pet friendly building. There is general storage for suitcases.

The Sales Gallery is located at 180 Orchard Street on the ground floor.

This excellent 708 square foot design driven one-bedroom, one-bath condominium residence captures the evolution of contemporary bohemian chic, fusing character-rich interiors by Incorporated Architecture & Design. Features include finished exposed concrete ceilings and elegant wide white oak floors. Oversized industrial-style windows display East facing neighborhood views. The custom kitchen blends exceptional form and function with bleached European walnut millwork, onyx lacquer cabinetry and a polished Nero Marquina marble backsplash juxtaposed against a polished Zen Black quartz countertop. Fully integrated, state-of-the-art Miele appliances include a steam oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, wall oven and 4-burner cooktop, with an under-counter wine refrigerator, Franke garbage disposal, and Miele stacked washer/dryer. Luxurious bathroom finishes boast honed Blue De Savoie marble floors and wainscoting, polished Bianco Dolomiti marble shower, and a polished Bianco Specchio countertop with polished chrome Waterworks fixtures.

A two-story, 30,000-square-foot Equinox Fitness Center and Spa with a private entrance occupies the second and third floors. The building is crowned by a private residents-only 4,100-square-foot rooftop terrace with a sky lawn, cabana seating, two chef's tables, and two al fresco kitchens. Additional amenities include a 24-hour attended lobby, bicycle storage, and private storage available for purchase.

The Sales Gallery is located at 180 Orchard Street on the ground floor.

Welcome home - where Soho meets the West Village. This high floor, spacious corner apartment spares nothing: Mint renovation, views, light, and a 100SF terrace. Renovation completed in 2008 included european style kitchen with open layout, subzero fridge, Bosch convection oven, gas cooktop stove, and ceasartone coutertops with artistic glass tiling for backsplash. Attention to detail is evident when it comes to functionality. Maple wood built in shelving throughout the living room along with Bose in wall speakers. Stunning glass tiling from floor to ceiling in airy and open bathroom, a Neptune soaking tub with Jado and Hansgrophe fixtures. And lastly... wait for it... YES -a washer and dryer!

This beautifully renovated 25-ft 2-unit condominium townhouse offers all the privacy and feel of a townhouse, with the full services and security of a luxury building. Renovated in 2010, no expense was spared in bringing the home into the 21st century, while retaining the classic finishes of the past. Upon entering the home through ornate iron doors you will find a concierge hall, which leads to a private marble gallery and sweeping staircase. The first floor of the home features a brand new state of the art eat-in kitchen as well as powder room, and garden. Filled with immaculate rooms for entertaining, the parlor floor boasts a library, dining room, bar, and powder room. On the third floor you will find the master suite with custom built-ins, walk in closet/dressing room and beautiful marble bathroom. This floor features two additional bedrooms and bathrooms. The home has a media room, and maid's suite, with full bathroom and laundry. Do not miss your chance to live in this incredible home, located just steps from Fifth Avenue and Central Park.

High floor mint condition two bedroom two bath with private terrace! Foreign buyers, trusts, corporate ownership and investors permitted. The sun-flooded home has open views, fantastic proportions, great closets, beautiful hardwood floors and a windowed kitchen stainless steel appliances. 20 East 68th is a meticulously maintained full-service CONDOP (not a landlease!) with twenty-four hours doorman located at the epicenter of the Upper East Side, where the arts, culture and dining are at their finest. Madison Avenue with its amazing boutiques and Central park are literally right downstairs. Please note there is a 2% flip tax paid by buyer.

Spacious Split Level on quiet shaded street south of the highway and close to all beaches, town center, schools and transportation. Home has all of the amenities for your enjoyment. Living Room, Formal Dining Room, Eat in Kitchen, Three Bedrooms, Large Great Room, Den Two Full Bathrooms, Two car Garage. Lovely Landscaped yard with room for a pool

20 Hausman is a brand new development boutique condominium building with 4 residences located in Greenpoint near the McGorick Park. All residences were uniquely crafted with the highest quality materials, constructed with premium finishes, prudent attention to details and efficient floorplan layouts to maximize square feet efficiencies. Each home at 20 Hausman feature: Soaring floor to ceilings windows, central A/C, washer/dryer hook ups, white oak floors, 10 Foot ceilings, custom LED lighting, granite counter tops, Calacatta back splash, stainless steel Bosch appliances, kitchen islands and a common roof top with impeccable city views!
Apartment Two: A very bright and spacious 2 bedroom Triplex / 1 full bathroom / 2 half bathrooms featuring a 700 square feet private back yard with windowed sun lit basement!! An ideal layout for comfort living and entertainment! This home also highlights: An open chefs kitchen, plentiful closet space throughout, a large tiled and glass bathroom featuring with dual oak vanities, dual functioning rain shower with a matte black finishes.
20 Hausman is accessible and conveniently located less than a mile from the G and L subway line, a block away from bus lines and easy access to the Brooklyn Queens Expy. Enjoy all of what Greenpoint has to offer from restaurants, bars, shops, groceries, galleries, beautiful parks, nightlife and much more within minutes! Don't miss your opportunity! Please contact us for your private showing!

Each home at 20 Hausman feature: Soaring floor to ceilings windows, central A/C, washer/dryer hook ups, white oak floors, 10 Foot ceilings, custom LED lighting, granite counter tops, Calacatta back splash, stainless steel Bosch appliances, kitchen islands and a common roof top with impeccable city views!

Apartment Three: A bright and functional 2 bedroom/1 bathroom with panoramic views of Manhattan and the Empire State Building with two terraces (one off from the kitchen and a second larger terrace off of the living room), an open chefs kitchen, plentiful closet space throughout, a large tiled and glass bathroom featuring with dual oak vanities, a flush-o-meter toilet, dual functioning rain shower with a matte black finishes.

20 Hausman is accessible and conveniently located less than a mile from the G and L subway line, a block away from bus lines and easy access to the Brooklyn Queens Expy. Enjoy all of what Greenpoint has to offer from restaurants, bars, shops, groceries, galleries, beautiful parks, nightlife and much more within minutes! Don't miss your opportunity! Please contact us for your private showing!

EAST END ELEGANCE. After a day of conquering Manhattan, arriving home to this beauty perched up on the seventh floor will be a delight in every way. Swimming-in-sunshine and perfectly planned, this original 3 bed, 2.5 bath currently configured as a luxurious 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath, pre-war beauty is the perfect, serene, bright residence on one of the Upper East Side's river facing tree-lined blocks. Meticulously renovated, this special space is the extraordinary embodiment of sleek, innovative, and elegant design.

The layout is an entertainer's paradise with nearly 2100 square feet of sprawling perfection. Dramatic 10 foot ceilings and gorgeous East River views, no detail was overlooked in this recent and complete gut renovation using only the finest materials from hand laid solid 5" oak plank floors to deep-set crown and base moldings throughout. Receive your guests in the welcoming foyer and invite them through the decadent dining room that easily accommodates 10-12 guests and offers an adjacent butler's wet bar, complete with wine cooler. Continue through the first of two seating areas into the spacious living room, an ideal and inviting space with tranquil river views. The impeccably designed chef's kitchen is a masterful work of art with built in banquet, custom cabinetry, granite countertops, Viking range & Miele vented hood, Sub-Zero fridge and Miele dishwasher. The epitome of luxury, this generously-sized master bedroom suite enjoys river views, a relaxing seating area and custom closets throughout. Relax and unwind in the spa-like, magazine worthy master en-suite bathroom with floor to ceiling Carrara marble, double vanity and sumptuous built-ins, designer nickel-plated fixtures and an oversized steam room complete with shower and free standing Neptune tub. An ideal split bedroom layout, the second bedroom also enjoys river views, custom-designed encased bookshelves and an en-suite bathroom. Gleaming oak floors, large custom closets, recessed lighting, Sonos sound system throughout and a washer dryer complete this incredible residence.

Downtown living uptown, this special coop is one of the only true loft conversions on the Upper East Side. Historically a lighting factory, 2 East End Avenue is an intimate white glove coop with 57 units and offers 24 hour doorman, supremely attentive resident manager, luxurious art-deco lobby, two fitness rooms, bike storage and additional optional storage units (for a minimal fee) just steps away from public transportation, the East River Promenade, lush Carl Schurz Park and some of the finest schools in the city. Desirably situated on tranquil East End Avenue, enjoy your front seat view of sailboats passing by on the awe inspiring East River.
