Triple mint two bedroom two bath with wood-burning fireplace, central air-conditioning and private laundry. This spectacular penthouse-like loft has just gone through a complete transformation incorporating exacting standards and an exceptional eye for detail. Enter intro a gracious entry gallery and be led to an enormous west-facing living room with high ceilings, exposed brick and wide plank hard floors. An automated home theater system with 7.1 surround sound, 130" HD projection screen and savant home automation provide a true entertainment experience. Speakers are integrated into the walls and ceiling so as to be hidden from view. The expertly designed open kitchen has solid walnut cabinetry, marble counters, 36" wolf range with infrared grill, pot filler handmade copper hood with 1200 CFM external exhaust, Insinkerator disposal, Wolf Microwave, Miele dishwasher and Subzero refrigerator, enormous private Ipe roof. Custom stairs lead to the master suite with great light from two exposures and is pin drop quiet. The master bath features a steam shower with frameless glass enclosure, integrated sound and top of the line fixtures. A custom-built walk-in closet has ample storage for your entire wardrobe and integrated private laundry. Step out onto your enormous private roof deck finished in Brazilian hardwood, perfect for dining al fresco or reading a great book as you soak in the sun. 200 Mercer is a well maintained pet friendly building with video intercom and full-time superintendent.

Nestled in the heart of Chelsea, at the famed Emory Roth designed Kensington House and housing an art deco lobby, beamed ceilings, and mahogany floors, this prime south facing split-level studio is perfect for any aspiring buyer looking for a place to call home. Situated on a tree lined corner of 20th Street and 7th Avenue, The Kensington House brings pre-war elegance together with a downtown feel that is true Chelsea. Steps from the famed High-Line walkway, the Gagosian and Gladstone Galleries, as well as restaurant galore, the property houses a large dressing area, two closets, a full-time doorman, an expansive roof deck, and subway access less than a block away. The property also features two built-in deluxe Murphy beds, which will comfortably sleep two each. Flexible sublet policy after one year, pet and pied a terre friendly.

This beautiful studio is bright, open, airy, with a recently renovated kitchen and bathroom, through-wall A/C, and high ceilings throughout. An open floor plan thirty-five feet long, with exceptional cabinet space and custom closets rarely found in a studio. Southern-facing views above the tree-line. Boutique, laid-back coop allows subletting, pieds-a-terre, gifting, co-purchasing, and 10% down payments! Laundry room, personal storage, and bike storage on site as well. The building is conveniently located near Central Park, Randall Island footbridge, express stops for the 4,5,6 & Q, Citibike just outside the door, and the new Whole Foods just two blocks away.Homes well-priced and in this a great location never stay around for long. Come see this one before it's gone.

2 Bed/2Bath Prewar Condo Duplex UWS approx. 2,291 sqft. Park BlockLocated steps away from Central Park, this two bedroom, two bathroom luxurious home is the epitome of Upper West Side Living.

The residence occupies 1½ floors of a magnificent extra-wide brownstone. Originally designed by George Walgrove in 1909 and then completely renovated by the legendary American home improvement icon, Bob Vila, and featured on the television "Home Again with Bob Vila" as their Manhattan renovation. The rebuild included top of the line structural, plumbing and electrical wiring throughout with spectacular finishes. The façade was meticulously renovated this summer to bring back the glory of the original 1900's Brownstone.

With 12-foot ceilings on the parlor level and a 90 square foot private outdoor balcony, this duplex maintains the original crown, plaster molding in the living room. Other highlights include an oversized chef's kitchen, custom millwork and new period-perfect marble bathrooms. This home is truly one-of-a-kind with unsurpassed elegance and exceptionally low carrying costs.

Features include:

- Central A/C
- Quarter-sawn wide-plank ash flooring
- Sub-Zero refrigerator and freezer
- Wolf 48-inch 6 burner+grill dual oven
- Wolf range hood with external extractor
- Miele Dishwasher

- Garbage Disposal
- Custom-made Thomas Bump kitchen cabinetry
- Basaltina stone benches
- Wet Bar with Sub-Zero Wine refrigerator
- Bosch Washer and Dryer
- Custom hand blown Murano Glass Chandelier
- Wood-burning fireplace
- Smith & Noble custom made Venetian blinds
- Custom-made California Closets

For the first time in years there is an opportunity to own a full two bedroom two bath home anywhere near this price range at this spectacular landmark condominium. With location second to none,The Ansonia affords residents a chance to enjoy evenings at the opera and ballet at Lincoln Center and the convenience of the subway, Fairway, Trader Joe's and charming cafes just steps away. This home features an open floorplan with a desirable split bedroom layout. The windowed kitchen has granite countertops and a subzero fridge. There are exquisite inlaid parquet floors and moldings throughout as well as abundant closets with extra tall doors befitting the ceilings which are 9.5 feet high.. One of the most beautiful buildings in New York, the Ansonia offers the convenience of a 24 hour doorman, concierge, parking garage and roof deck . This is where Babe Ruth walked the same halls as Stravinsky, Toscanini and Caruso in his bathrobe, where baseball players funded by Arnold Rothstein put the fix on the 1919 World Series and Bette Midler made her name.. Now you can be part of the legend! P.S. You never have to wait for an elevator .

Midtown East Bliss... Welcome Home! This beautiful two bedroom prewar beauty enjoys a stylish character uniquely its own. The spacious south facing living room boasts a wood burning fireplace, decadent beamed ceilings, gigantic steel casement windows and custom built-in bookshelves and entertainment area. With ample cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a lovely seated bench area, this kitchen is sure to bring out your inner chef! The adjacent dining area can comfortably seats six. The tranquil master bedroom enjoys two exposures and custom built-in closets. A second bedroom both quiet and comfortable also offers custom built-ins. A wood burning fireplace, beamed ceilings, brand new casement windows, brand new LG washer and dryer, and gleaming hardwood floors complete this special residence. This excellent coop offers a supremely attentive 24 hour doorman, common garden area on the first floor, bike room and central laundry. Pet friendly, too!

Open House Sunday 10/22 at 1-2PM South Facing, Stunning High Floor 1 Bdrm Apt in the Sky! Enjoy luxury living at its best in Extell's Fabulous 212 Building. This Sunny, Fully Renovated Apt features State of the Art Open Kitchen and Terrific Balcony, with sweeping views of the Chrysler Building and East River. This is a full service 24hr Doorman & Concierge Building with World Class Fitness Center, Lounge, Conference Room and Incredible Roof Deck. Centrally located, close to Grand Central, fine shops and top notch restaurants. Not to be missed.

Rare opportunity to purchase a 2 BR, 2Bath apartment with huge planted private terrace large enough for a table and chairs for al fresco dining. Upon entering 18CD into the living room, one sees views of sky and gardens across 57th Street. The floors in this area are plank oak wood. To the left is the second of the two bedrooms which has been used as an office with many closet built-ins; these could be removed to make a larger second bedroom. There is high-hat ceiling lighting throughout the apartment. On the right of the main entry door is the kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steel cabinets. There is a Gaggenau oven in the kitchen. The dining area has charming built-in cabinetry, as well as the living room. Off the dining area is a double glass door leading to the large planted terrace where one could put table and chairs. In the spacious master bedroom, there is a wall of windows and a door that also leads to the terrace. Closets are abundant throughout this gracious home, many of which are walk-in. The master bedroom has an ensuite bathroom. The apartment is filled with Northeastern light. On Billionaires' Row next to Whole Foods, Bloomingdales, Bloomberg Corporate HQ, great restaurants, all shopping and transportation to everyplace, The Carlton East is a perfect location. Amenities include 24 hour doorman, a resident manager, a central laundry facility, and a bike room. There is even a dentist in the commercial space of the Carlton East as well as BoConcepts Furniture Store, and Lillian Nassau antique lamps and art glass shop.

Welcome to 9J, one of the coveted corner residences with south and west exposures. The apartment features 3 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms with tremendous natural light and incredible views of the Hudson River. The gracious entertaining space boasts a large living room, corner dining area, windowed eat-in kitchen with granite counter tops and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances. A spacious master suite has abundant closets including a huge walk-in, and five-fixture master bath. Two additional bedrooms and bathrooms, and powder room with w/d round out this 2,100+ square foot home.220 Riverside Boulevard is a premier Upper West Side condo conveniently located close to Riverside Park, Lincoln Center, and Central Park. Five-star building amenities include 24-hour white glove doorman, concierge, garage in the building with private elevator access, 12,500 sq ft health club with a large swimming pool/hot tub, private large internal courtyard, formal party room, billiard's room, bike room and children's play room.

Welcome home to 222 Hancock Street- an impeccably restored landmark townhouse that is now stunning high-end boutique condominiums, located on Bedford Stuyvesant's single most desirable block. This 20' X 70' Romanesque Revival mansion is of rare architectural pedigree built at a time when Hancock Street was one of the most coveted in all of Brooklyn.
Unit 1 is one of the grandest, and most lovingly restored condominium homes ever offered in Bed Stuy. It occupies the entire parlor, garden, and basement levels of this massive, 20' X 70' building. It is a 3,127 square foot 3 Bedroom, 3 baths + 2 half bath triplex with an expansive deck, gas grill and an L shaped, 25' wide backyard. The 70' triple parlor floor is a true showpiece and an entertainer's dream. It features soaring ceilings with original plaster details and over 1,250 square feet of entertaining, living, and dining space. It has floors with original inlays, a pier mirror, original built-ins, pocket shutters, and beautiful antique mantle with a working gas fireplace. Rare stained glass windows are accented, flooding the apartment with natural northern and southern sunlight. The huge chef's kitchen features high-end stainless steel appliances, a large statuary island and a breakfast bar area with stunning woodwork. On this level and just off the kitchen, is a wrap-around, 206 square foot deck, perfect for grilling and entertaining.

An exquisitely designed staircase leads down to the backyard perfect for relaxing and/or gardening. On the floor below are three very large bedrooms all with en-suite baths. The master bedroom suite includes two separate closets and an implacably designed master bathroom with double vanities, heated flooring, and steam shower. The stone lined wine cellar is temperature regulated and is perfect for wine connoisseurs! The rec-room level has an additional working fireplace. The home has central AC; heat zoned by room, a washer/dryer, and video intercom. Conveniently surrounded by the best that Bed Stuy has to offer including trendy shops/restaurants (Peaches Hot House, Eugene & Company, Hart's, Saraghina, Black Swan, Le Paris Dakar, Bed-Vyne Brew). The C, and A express train (which will get you to Manhattan faster than the C from Clinton Hill!) and the LIRR are extremely close.

This home is a superb townhouse alternative offering horizontal living, preserved detail, and a location that is difficult to match.

The sale of the units within 222 Hancock Condominium is pursuant to Index Number NA17-0029, which is on file with the New York State Department of Law (the "No Action Application"). Investors are advised that sales are conducted pursuant to the No Action Application. 222 Hancock LLC, the developer of the property, shall respond to offers of interest from individuals and entities that possess a background in acquiring real estate or engaging in commercial real estate transactions in New York City. Equal housing opportunity.

Welcome home to 222 Hancock, an impeccably restored landmark townhouse that will be converted into two high-end boutique condominiums, located on arguably Bed Stuy's single most desirable block. This 20ft wide Romanesque Revival building is of a rare architectural pedigree, built at a time when Hancock Street was one of the most coveted in all of Brooklyn.

Unit 2 is a nearly 2000 sqft. duplex with 3 Bedrooms, 2.5 baths, an expansive porcelain paved terrace and a stunning full floor roof deck overlooking Brooklyn and Manhattan. The main living level occupies a full floor offering approximately 1000 square feet for living, dining, cooking, and entertaining. There is an open chef's kitchen with high-end stainless steel appliances and large statuary marble island. On this level, there is a 20ft terrace; an oasis for gardening and grilling all year long. The living room has coffered ceilings and a beautiful antique mantle with working gas fireplace. In totality, this floor offers an almost unheard of 70ft living and entertaining space. All three bedrooms are large and are on the upper level. The Master bedroom consists of an en-suite bathroom with double vanities, four shower heads, heated flooring, steam shower and a huge walk-in closet with a skylight! An exquisitely designed wrought iron staircase leads up to the roof deck which opens into approximately 900 square feet of outdoor space. Rare arched stained glass windows are accented throughout the unit, flooding the apartment with natural sunlight from every angle. In total, there are 14 windows pouring in both northern and southern natural light. The unit has central AC, heat zoned by room, a washer/dryer, and video intercom. This Penthouse is a detail lover's dream; full of rich, original character carefully preserved.

Conveniently located very close to trendy shops/restaurants (Peaches Hot House, Eugene & Company, Saraghina, Black Swan) and A, C express train stop and the LIRR. This unit is a luxurious apartment, a one-of-a-kind home.

Sophisticatedly designed by the renowned Pembrooke & Ives, this Upper West Side three bedroom, two and a half bath condominium home on the tenth floor at The Astor truly is incomparable.

A striking entry gallery welcomes you into a warm great room with an open eat-in-kitchen. The smartly designed kitchen features Lerfoy Brooks fixtures, Calacatta marble countertops and backsplash, custom paneled millwork in matte white, a center island clad in full Calacatta marble slabs complete with a tasteful assortment of top of the line Gaggenau, Miele, and Subzero appliances.

The beautiful master bedroom is accompanied by a sophisticated master bathroom veiled in floor to ceiling Calacatta Gold, Nero Gold and Tundra Grey marble tiles accented by Haisa marble mosaics. A deep MTI freestanding soaking tub, Lefroy Brooks fixtures throughout, double sink vanity, radiant heated floors, Durviat by Starck wall mounted water closet and shower complete the lavish bathroom.

The additional two bedrooms have custom en-suite bathrooms which feature Lefroy Brooks fixtures, 24 inch square honed Glassos tile floors lined with 6 inch square ceramic tiled walls completed with custom vanities of Glassos slab, custom frameless medicine cabinets, Kohler under mount porcelain sinks, Durviat by Starck wall mounted water closet, Kohler under mount bathtub with polished Glassos slab deck within the shower.

A powder room decked with Nordic Grey Stone slab and a polished Glassos countertop with nickel vanity pedestal. A laundry area with a Bosch washer/dryer completes this exceptional home.

Additional Features Include:5in Herringbone floors in living areas with walnut inlay; Double paned insulated windows; Individual climate control in every room; 10ft ceilings; Smartly prewired for motorized shades, advanced home automation, AV systems, and TimeWarner Cable or Fios

242 Broome represents a rare opportunity for anyone seeking a modern home in the Lower East Side, one of New York's most storied neighborhoods. Designed by next-generation firm SHoP Architects, the building's champagne-colored façade softly reflects the surrounding buildings, while capturing an ever-changing dance between past and future. Utilizing a sophisticated mix of materials - slab marble, blackened steel, and warm woods - the artistic, custom-designed interiors by DXA Studio exude calm and comfort.

This one-of-a-kind 1,683 SF, three-bedroom, three and a half bathroom residence features 10'1/2" ceilings and 7" wide-plank white oak floors throughout. The gracious, sun-soaked, open concept living and kitchen space embraces south and west exposures, and is complete with a dining area perfect for entertaining. The kitchen offers warm grey walnut cabinetry with a polished Calacatta marble countertop, backsplash, and kitchen island. Fully integrated, state-of-the-art Gaggenau appliances include a stainless steel 36" five-burner gas cooktop, 30" electric oven, 30" speed oven, refrigerator, freezer, and wine refrigerator.

The master bedroom reveals an oversized walk-in closet and a luxurious en suite master bath with radiant heated flooring. Alanur honed marble floors and wet walls, Imperial Danby countertops, a custom walnut vanity, and a shower with thermostat and volume regulators are complemented by Duravit polished chrome fixtures. The secondary bedrooms also provide ample closet space and en-suite bathrooms with honed marble floors and tiled wet walls. Off the foyer, the stylish powder room has honed marble floors and a floor-to-ceiling surface mounted mirror, with a Corian vanity and sink.

The residence comes complete with a washer and dryer, and the option to purchase residential storage. 242 Broome's extensive, lifestyle-enhancing amenity program includes: 24-hr doorman/concierge and building manager, fitness center with changing areas, entertainment lounge with kitchen, flex space and billiards, and a beautifully landscaped rooftop terrace with outdoor dining. The building is also expected to offer an anticipated 421-a tax abatement.

This charming pre-war 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo at The Century boasts 1640 square feet, embracing the distinctive art deco details unique to this New York City landmark. The spacious layout of this residence is separated yet balanced by a grand entrance foyer. To the left, the windowed kitchen with adjoining dining room features fully restored glass front cabinets, black stone countertops and stainless steel appliances including a Sub Zero refrigerator and Miele dishwasher. The original floor plan included a powder room off of the kitchen that was converted into a laundry room. To the right off of the entry landing, step down into a sunny and south facing living room with open views of 15 Central Park West to Columbus Circle. An original decorative fireplace with the Century's art deco logo is etched into the custom mirror hanging just above; a notable design element. Down the hallway are two large closets leading to the bedrooms at the back of the apartment. The master bedroom with ensuite bath includes 2 large custom built closets as well as the second bedroom/home office across the hallway. Additional residence details include hardwood floors, recessed lighting, generous storage and closet space.
The Century is a full service luxury prewar condominium built in the 1930's by Irwin Chanin. It spans an entire block on Central Park West from West 62nd to West 63rd Streets. Architecturally significant, with three attended entrances and 24/7 concierge, it is an excellent investment destination for a gracious home or perfect pied a terre. Additionally, there are 2 central laundry rooms, bike room, landscaped courtyard and private storage for rent (currently there is waiting list). In addition to the park and Lincoln Center, highly rated restaurants, upscale shopping and a Whole Foods Market are nearby at Time Warner Center.

NEW TO THE MARKET, Expansive East Facing Two Bedroom Two Bath with Unobstructed River Views. RARELY AVAILABLE sun-flooded, move-in-ready, corner 2br/2ba in renowned Tudor Tower.

Welcome to a beautiful high-floor, split layout apartment with a wide open view of peaceful Tudor City South Park. The gorgeous hardwood floors, beamed ceilings, and original windows ooze New York's classic pre-war charm. This perfectly laid out home allows for living and dining areas and abundant custom built-in closet space in all rooms. No details were spared in the renovation of this unit: from the recessed lighting in the entrance to the Cesar stone kitchen counter tops and subway tile backsplash, and high-end stainless steel appliances, you will be delighted by the quality of the finishes. The King-sized master bedroom and second bedroom each have their own en-suite bathroom and plenty of closet space.

Your electricity, AC, heat and hot water are all included in the maintenance which is 50% tax deductible.

Built in 1929 by developer Fred French, Tudor Tower is a 23-floor, Gothic-style, red brick building which counts a full time doorman, a gorgeous roof deck with city and river views, a laundry room, a bike room, and a storage room. Residents also have access to 5 Tudor Place's gym for a fee. Close proximity to the Ford Foundation, United Nations, East River, and Grand Central make this building a Murray Hill favorite.

Tudor Tower is a flexible co-op which allows pied-a-terres, co-purchasing, purchasing for children, purchasing in a trust. 80% financing is also allowed. For investors, subletting is allowed 5 out of 10 years after 1 year of occupancy! For your storage needs, two sizes of cages are available for rent for $40 and $80 month (waiting list) Cats are allowed but sorry, no dogs.

Gracious prewar, top floor apartment flooded with light. Hardwood floors, high ceilings, 6 south-facing windows, and a windowed, eat-in kitchen. Just updated! New kitchen appliances (including dishwasher and counter-depth fridge), tiled backsplash, quartz countertops; bathroom has new vanity and reglazed tub. Come home to this gorgeous home in the heart of Battery Park for the best 1 bed condo for only $698K in Manhattan. This stunning space has sweeping southern and western views through huge windows. The home sits on the 12th floor of the Hudson View East, condo living at its' best. 12H has a wonderfully wide layout in the living room giving a great division of space to spread out between living and dining areas. Similarly the bedroom has a great useable space that easily fits a king bed and dresser. In additional to the usable layout to maximize livable space there are several large closets throughout the home for great storage.

The kitchen is an open design with outstanding counter space, full size appliances, and lots of storage which will allow your inner chef to come out in full force. The bathroom is a timeless, clean and updated marble design perfect for the space.

The building is one of the best around with 24 hour doorman, laundry on every floor, and an amazing landscaped owner's garden with fountains and BBQ grills for entertaining or just relaxing in private.

Outside the building you have one of the most pristine and manicured neighborhoods in Manhattan with wonderful parks and access to the waterfront. The neighborhood is booming with some of the best additions to quality living in the city with the Marina and Brookfield place just to the north and the WTC site, Oculus and Westfield mall just the east. There is also the rest of Financial District, Tribeca and Soho all a short walk under 15 minutes. More about neighborhood and building can be found at http://batteryparkcity.net

Transportation has its own Battery Park shuttle, as well as 1, 4, 5, R, W, J and Z subway stations all nearby.

Call us to schedule a showing and make this incredible home yours.

Ultra luxury 254 Park Avenue South is the epitome of the NYC high life. This large one bedroom, plus home office, and loft space has 2 full bathrooms. The apartment includes washer and dryer and stainless steel appliances. Excellent storage above the kitchen in the loft space.

All of the breathtaking finishes and amenities make this beautifully restored limestone building the perfect marriage of period character and modern style. The entire building has been expertly designed by Charles Allem. Allem is known for his glamorous interiors characterized by sumptuous materials and sleek compositions which are immediately apparent when you enter the lobby door.

The building features 24 hour Doorman, Resident fitness center with cardiovascular and weight-lifting machines and a private Lounge with poker and pool tables.

Located in the heart of the Flatiron district you are right nearby Union Square and Madison Square and Gramercy. You will love this location central to all the trains and everything that Manhattan has to offer

Charming one family brick home in Sheepshead Bay that needs a little TLC. Nice layout with 2nd floor having three bedrooms (all with closets), full bathroom and 1st floor layout consisting of living room, dining room and kitchen with doorway to spacious backyard. Basement has been just renovated with a large room, full bathroom, partial kitchen area, mechanical room and doorway to backyard & front of house. Private driveway leads to indoor built in one car garage.

Convenient location close to all that Sheepshead Bay has to offer.

With a highly coveted DEEDED indoor parking space, a HUGE private storage room, 3 exposures, a private balcony, a large capacity vented washer/dryer and countless recent upgrades, this 2 bedroom, 2 bath South Slope condo is sure to go quickly!

Overall this apartment has a very thoughtful floor plan with high ceilings and great separation of space that makes it feel more like a sprawling HOME beginning with a wide entry foyer that includes room for a bench to remove your shoes after a long day and an ample coat closet. The windowed kitchen is separate and includes space for a table for four, abundant storage in dark stained cabinetry, a new sink and faucet, all new hardware, new plumbing and stainless steel appliances including a nearly new stove with 5 burners and a double oven. The living room is open and large enough for even oversize furniture or to section off a home office space if needed and includes sliding glass doors on one end that lead you to the well-sized balcony overlooking the tree lined street and with seasonal views of the Statue of Liberty.

The master bedroom is very spacious and would comfortably accommodate even the largest of king sized furnishings and has double closets plus upper storage. The master bathroom has a large stall shower plus a new cabinet with great storage, all new faucets and hardware and great natural light through a glass blocked window. The second bedroom is generously sized with a large closet and additional upper storage. A second full bath with a large Jacuzzi tub, also with a new cabinet, faucets and hardware, plus a glass block window for light rounds out the floor plan. The entire home has been recently painted, has solid hardwood floors throughout, central AC, dimmer switches, video intercom, and all of the closets are outfitted with the Elfa storage system.

This 20 unit elevator building has a recently renovated common interior courtyard, tax abatement through 2029, low common charges and is zoned for PS 10.

Located just a couple of blocks to the R or the F/G trains and only steps from all of the great dining, shopping and nightlife that Park Slope has to offer.

Do you want to live on one of the most beautiful park blocks in Park Slope? Do you love original detail? Do you want the opportunity to make a house your own? Do you want to own a brownstone with a deeded parking space (not included in the price)? 282 Garfield Place is the house you are looking for.

282 Garfield Place can easily be transformed into a 2 family with rental income or a grand single family house, The owners' duplex, which is made up of the parlor floor and the floor above, has extraordinary original detail, including original mahogany wainscoting and extraordinary crown molding. You enter the parlor floor through original beveled-glass pocket doors and then move through to the center parlor with an original decorative fireplace. You then pass through a second set of original pocket doors into the extra-large formal dining room with vintage Tiffany style chandelier, original herringbone oak floors, and a second detailed fireplace. A renovated kitchen in the rear extension, with granite countertops and stainless appliances completes the parlor floor, with access to the beautifully landscaped garden.

On the third floor, there is a lovely sitting area off the hallway, with original mahogany woodwork, as well as a hallway bathroom. There are two large bedrooms, with beautiful crown molding and a pass through with original ceramic sinks and original built in storage. A back staircase provides access to the parlor floor.

A top floor rental unit completes the building. It is currently configured as a 2 bedroom/ 1 bath apartment with renovated eat-in-kitchen.

You will live less than a block to the Garfield Place entrance to Prospect Park, and just a short distance to the main branch of the Brooklyn Public Library, the Brooklyn Botanic Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum On Saturdays, you can enjoy the wonders of the Greenmarket at Grand Army Plaza. 7th Avenue shopping and restaurants are nearby, as well as the 2,3, B, Q trains to Manhattan.

First time in 40 years, this top floor classic 7 room apartment is now being offered for sale. You will love the original oak wood floors, prewar 10ft high beamed ceilings and gorgeous wood paneling hand-chiseled by Italian artisans in the 80's. An arched hand-carved doorway graciously opens into the expansive living room from the quaint celestial-celinged foyer. The gallery to the formal dining room is perfect for hanging your prized artwork. Extra windows have been added in the master bedroom for beautiful southeast light. It has a separate windowed bathroom. The 2nd bedroom has a windowed en-suite bath. The 2 maid's rooms can be turned into an office or 3rd bedroom with its own windowed bathroom. The long kitchen also has its own window. Design this apartment according to your modern day needs and lifestyle.


29 East 64th Street is a premier 1922 brick and limestone 12-story building designed by George Frederick Pelham. From the top floor apartment, you can enjoy the classic view of the Verona building elegantly designed by the Wm Mowbray featured in Historic Manhattan Apartment Houses. Enjoy the luxury of having only 2 apartments per floor with its semi-private vestibule from the elevator. Nestled in the heart of Madison's finest stores with Chanel occupying its prime retail space, 29 East 64th Street offers posh white glove service with 24-hour doorman. Pied-a-terres and pets allowed. Central Laundry. Storage included.

Enjoy this rare penthouse 1-Bedroom with generous, spacious and sun-lit rooms with soaring 12ft+ ceilings, in the historic Cotton Exchange Building.

This highly sought-after sun-lit, 1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom top-floor penthouse is an ideal home with a spacious open layout, open kitchen, loft-like high ceilings, and custom storage, hardwood floors throughout. Every window has sunny treetop and private courtyard views, enjoyed only by a few. The classic pre-war construction ensures quiet enjoyment!

The master bedroom is equipped with an extremely generous, and well-outfitted, walk-in closet. Its spacious bathroom, wrapped in marble, has a walk-in shower with a multitude of spa-like features; double rainfall shower heads over a marble bench, 3 body jets and steam to complete the relaxing experience.

Entertaining or simple meals are a joy in this top-of-the-line-equipped open chef's kitchen. It was remodeled by Neff Kitchen with blonde walnut cabinetry and matching doors to conceal the Sub Zero refrigerator. Rare Juparana Colombo Granite also wraps the kitchen surfaces, backsplash and the bi-level chef's island which houses the sub-zero wine cooler and breakfast bar, offering multiple dining options.

Keep your oversized furniture. The living room is spacious and has dedicated entertainment center nook and is prewired for surround sound.

3 Hanover Square is a unique full service and pet-friendly building with a rich history. Amenities include a 24-hour doorman, package delivery, live-in super, courtyard, garden, laundry on every third floor, and shared common storage for each apartment.

The location is ideally situated near Wall Street, Battery Park, the newly opened Oculus, Westfield Mall Brookfield Place, as well as the soon-to-open Whole Foods at One Wall Street. The Fulton Street hub with 4/5/W/R/1/2/3/J/Z subway lines connect you to the rest of Upper and Lower Manhattan and Brooklyn with ease. From Pier 11, you can enjoy ferry service to Astoria, Dumbo, Williamsburg, Red Hook, midtown, as well as the Rockaways and NJ, by boat.

This is a beautiful west facing home on the 31st floor with 9 feet ceiling on the waterfront of Battery Park City. You can watch the stunning sunsets from every room of this relaxing apartment of 1190sqft with living space, 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms, and separate master suite with double marble sinks, soaking tub and separate glass shower. Oversized windows - and a custom kitchen with a stone countertops, Miele dishwasher, Viking gas range, Subzero refrigerator/freezer, and a U-line wine cooler. Open living concept with incredible views of the Statue of Liberty, and the Hudson River. Green living meets luxurious amenities in this LEED gold certificated building. With its 24 hour concierge and doorman, 1,500 Sq Ft Fitness room, Bicycle Storage, Children's Playroom & Valet Parking. Its air filtration system provides residents with fresh tempered and filtered air directly to the apartment. Its solar rooftop, advanced mechanicals and rooftop water cachet system are all designed to save energy as well as reduce building expenses. Just steps from 25-acre Battery Park, Sirius Dog Run, Eataly NYC Downtown, Le District, Regal Cinemas movie theater complex, and Brookfield Place and Westfiled WTC shopping centers. Only several minutes walk to Wall Street, Tribeca, and close to all subway lines, fantastic restaurants and shops. Please contact Calvin for showing.

This extremely well-priced sprawling, triple mint 3 bedroom/2.5 bathroom loft-style, corner residence boasts 10 foot ceilings and open, city views of the Chrysler Building, Empire State Building as well as the the western sky through floor to ceiling windows. The spacious living room has a flexible layout and plenty of room for a separate dining area. The open, windowed kitchen was designed by Gruppo Italia and has top-of-the-line appliances by Bosch. The floor to ceiling windows in the entertaining rooms have been outfitted with remote controlled shades. The master bedroom has a walk-in closet with en-suite bathroom. There are two additional bedrooms which share a full bath and a powder room, as well.Building amenities include Abigail Michaels Concierge Services, fitness center and spa, rooftop, and back patio. Built in 2010, The Tempo is a high-end, new development condominium in Gramercy with a 421A tax abatement until 2022.

This grand two bedroom, two bathroom home offers floor-to-ceiling windows, a large private corner terrace, and northern, southern, and eastern exposures. The kitchen offers Bosch appliances, Liebherr refrigerator and Grohe Ladylux Chrome fixtures. The bathrooms offer fixtures by Grohe and Turkish Calacatta marble. Other residence highlights in this corner apartment include oak flooring, a windowed kitchen and a spacious and generous floor plan. Building amenities include a landscaped roof deck with grilling station and wet bar, resident's lounge with library and media room, gym, fitness studio, treatment room and laundry lounge. Sponsor offering 5% contract deposit and immediate occupancy!

ACTUAL VIEW PICTUES! A rare jewel high above Manhattan. Stunning and precious, this spacious two bedroom, two bath apartment has not one, but two covered outdoor spaces that offer sweeping and unobstructed views of Central Park, Columbus Circle, and the gorgeous skyline. Enjoy breathtaking vistas that span to the north from the George Washington Bridge to the southern tip of New York City and beyond. A formal entrance foyer leads you into an expansive living room with three exposures and an oversize bay window. There is a designer open chef's kitchen with breakfast bar then opens up to the dining room. The kitchen comes complete with Eggersmann Cabinetry, SubZero refrigerator, Fisher Paykel double drawer dishwasher, and an in-wall Miele/ Nespresso Cappuccino maker . The bedrooms are both spacious and their split layout is optimal for privacy. The extra large master suite has expansive views of Central Park, while the second bedroom gets a birds eye view of the Manhattan Skyline and World Trade Center. Ample custom built closet space, a vented washer/dryer, and marble baths complete this home. The Central Park Place is one of Manhattan's most desirable condominiums. Services include a 24-hour doorman; health club with indoor swimming pool, sauna, boxing room, massage room, yoga room; terrace; party room/lounge; overnight guest suites; and even a private entrance to subway. Pets are welcome.

Corner full-service luxury studio with private terrace and low-monthlies. Newly renovated hardwood floors throughout, entrance foyer which can be converted to a walk-in-closet, and full-size kitchen with Sub-Zero appliances. Upscale marble bathroom with dressing room and more closets! Pin-drop quiet and with private outdoor oasis to match. Excellent closet space, plus additional storage available, 24-hour doorman, fitness center, laundry room, outdoor rooftop lounge, bicycle room, pet-friendly and pied-a-terres welcome. Will not last! Contact Tatiana Mross of Douglas Elliman for showing.

Move-in ready and one block away from new Second Avenue Subway (Q & N lines) on 86th Street and Second Avenue! Beautifully renovated 4-story red brick townhouse on the Upper East Side with 4 bedrooms and 760sf private garden. No detail was overlooked in the restoration of this early twentieth century home. The garden floor boasts a state-of-the-art windowed chef's kitchen with Sub Zero and Viking appliances and wine refrigerator. An adjoining dining or gallery area with powder room and cozy den with fireplace leads out to the beautifully landscaped garden, perfect for year-round grilling and spring and summer entertaining. On the parlor level is a grand living room with fireplace, dining area with wet bar, and a home office/study with fireplace. Much of the home's unique architectural history is evident on this floor, including 11-foot ceilings, arched entryways, wood-paneled window shutters, and an impressive Americana-style staircase. The third floor has two bedrooms (one with fireplace) that are serviced by one full bathroom. A newly renovated laundry room with separate washer and dryer are also on the floor. On the skylit fourth floor are two additional bedrooms (one with fireplace) and a luxurious spa bathroom complete with a Duravit soaking tub, steam shower, double sinks, and skylight. Additional features of the townhouse include two entries (stoop and under stoop) with front yard, hardwood floors throughout, and wine storage in the cellar.

Situated near the top of the iconic Link building, this fortieth floor two bedroom/two and a half bathroom home is perched high above it all. Offering almost 360 degree views, a well thought out floorplan, beautiful finishes, a split bedroom layout, and ceiling heights in excess of 10 feet, this property truly is a rare find. The property has high end contemporary finishes, and its soaring panels of glass and high ceilings provide amazing light and a sense of tranquility. The kitchen is located efficiently between the dining and living rooms, and is equipped with lacquered cabinetry designed by Poggenpohl, as well as top of the line appliances including Sub Zero refrigeration, a Bosch cook top, oven, and dishwasher, and a garbage disposal. Just off the kitchen is a breakfast nook/office, boasting southern and western exposures. The spa level bathrooms are crisply designed, and complete with meticulous tile work. The dining area is located in a corner surrounded by undulating glass, and the home's southwestern corner location provides unimpeded views from every room. The thoughtful floorplan also maximizes the privacy of the bedrooms. Included with this home is a large walk-in storage unit located in the building. Finally, a washer/dryer is located within this bright and quiet home. A stone's throw from Central Park, the Link offers a 24-hour doorman/concierge, onsite live-in super, a double height, glass-paned state-of-the-art fitness center and lounge, and a 3,200sf landscaped outdoor terrace. The building also is pet friendly, close to NYC's theater district, and convenient to all major transportation and award winning restaurants.

This two family townhouse has been occupied by the current owner since 1983. It features a one bedroom, one bath garden floor-through rental unit having its own separate entrance as well as access to the rear yard, and highlights a 5 bedroom, 2 bath owner's triplex having a rear deck with steps leading to a relaxing garden. Updates in 1987 includes all new windows, new plumbing, updated electric, a new gas boiler and 4 heat zones. The hot water tank was replaced in 2014, the kitchen was renovated in 2004 and a layer was added to the roof in 2013. Located in prime Central Harlem in close proximity to City College, St. Nicholas Park, the Harlem YMCA, the Schomburg, Harlem Hospital, Strivers Row, Restaurant Row and the 2 ,3 , B, C subways. Just one train stop to 125th Street and to West 145th Street's commercial corridor. Call for a private viewing today!

Location.StreetIntersection: River Side Dr. & West End Ave

BasicDetails.Description:
Located on a short and beautiful tree-lined block between Riverside Drive and West End Avenue, 324 West 80th Street is a rare 24-foot wide limestone townhouse, recently renovated with a brand new elevator. It offers over 8,000 square feet of living space with 6 bedrooms and 7.5 bathrooms. Built in 1898-1899 by noted architect, Clarence True, this six-story home features a stunning Elizabethan Renaissance Revival style bow-front façade with Roman brick and limestone trim and a ceramic tile pitched roof. Inside, generous proportions and bright light abound.

The Entry Floor welcomes guests into a gracious reception gallery with modern ribbon fireplace and a magnificent cherry wood sculptural staircase. A library and guest bedroom with full bath are located in the rear in addition to a separate service entrance on the western front of the house.

The Parlor Floor boasts almost 11-foot ceilings and offers a formal living room that spans the entire width of the house. It features a gas fireplace with remote-starter and a built-in wet bar. The south-facing dining room, with original dentil molding and beamed ceiling, is ornamented by a Juliet balcony that overlooks the house garden through stained glass windows. A professional-grade windowed chef's kitchen services the dining room and boasts a separate stainless steel prep area with industrial kitchen faucet sprayer, glass Sub Zero refrigerator, separate Sub Zero beverage refrigerator, Viking range, Monogram double ovens with a separate warming drawer, and two Bosch dishwashers. A powder room is located off the floor landing.

Upstairs on the Fourth Floor are three bedrooms. The rear south-facing bedroom serves as a second master suite and features a fireplace, two walk-in closets and an en-suite bath with double vanity, Jacuzzi tub and separate shower. A second full bathroom is located off the floor landing.

The Fifth Floor is dedicated to the master suite and highlights a spacious south-facing bedroom with fireplace and a windowed marble bath complete with a digitally controlled walk-in rain shower with double shower-heads, free-standing egg-shaped soaking tub, double vanity and heated floors and towel bars. A secondary full marble bathroom, sitting area with fireplace and a windowed dressing room with custom vanity and built-ins complete the floor.

The home's generous offering of entertaining space continues on the Sixth Floor with a sky-lit lounge with almost 18-foot ceilings. It is serviced by an auxiliary kitchenette with stainless steel appliances, a copper-top bar, large-screen TV and custom sound. There is also a guest bedroom with full bath and an enormous walk-in closet. Combined, all of these elements enable the floor to serve as an elegantly appointed guest suite/apartment, if so desired.

Beyond, a beautifully designed floating wood staircase off the lounge leads to a fully decked and planted Rooftop terrace featuring a temperature-controlled pavilion with wet-bar, glorious west, south and north views as well as custom lighting and sound.

The fully-finished Garden Level is spotlighted by a home theater, 500-bottle wine cellar, home office/secondary bedroom with full kitchenette, full bath, laundry, plentiful storage as well as a beautiful south-facing patio garden.

Additional features of the home include custom mink grey -stained oak floors throughout and a brand new high-speed Savaria elevator servicing the Entry through Sixth Floors. The new Sonos sound system, custom Lutron lighting (automated sensor lighting on all landings), and electronic front door can all be controlled by your cell phone. Also available for rent at $45,000 per month.

This beautiful newly renovated corner classic six home is located at the well-regarded Essex House in Tudor City, one of the finest landmarked cooperatives in the area.The South and East exposures in this wonderfully laid out three bed/three bath home allow natural sunlight to radiate throughout. The gracious foyer and gallery welcome you into this pristine prewar apartment. The expansive living room make this classic six seamless for entertaining. Elaborate Prewar details abound throughout including 9ft. high beamed ceilings and restored oak hardwood floors. Oversized casement windows allow for natural sunlight to fill each room. The apartment offers thru wall air conditioning and custom built-in cabinets that were both added within the last year. The open, eat in kitchen has a breakfast bar and pass through to the dining room/den. The kitchen is complete with quartz counter tops, white tiled backsplash and stainless steel appliances. The generously proportioned living room offers a functioning wood-burning fireplace, decorative built-in shelving and crown molding. The Master Suite has double exposures, abundant closets and a very well-proportioned en-suite bath. The second and third bedrooms each have their own en-suite full bathroom and ample closet space with custom built ins. The Essex House is an elegant prewar elevator building with a full service 24 -hour doorman, central laundry room, bike room, live-in resident super, common courtyard and private storage. The building is pet friendly and pied-a-terre purchases are allowed.Located on a coveted tree-lined street, the Essex House is near various manicured parks and playgrounds, transportation options, Grand Central Station, the UN, theater district, and excellent shopping and fine dining options. **Buyer pays 2% flip tax. First showings will be at our Sunday open house on 6/18**

This Highly Sought After, X-Large 1BR/1.5Bth + Large Private Balcony. This Spacious, Loft-Like, North & East Facing Unit which offers Great Sunlight and Open City Views, also boasts Floor to Ceiling Windows w/ soaring 10ft Ceilings, Washer/Dryer in Unit, and Private Wall Safe in Unit. The Open, Windowed Chef's Kitchen Includes Granite Counter Tops, Sub-Zero Refrigerator, Bosch Stove & Oven, Bosch Dishwasher, Microwave, and Garbage Disposal. Pets Welcome.

BUILDING FEATURES - This Luxury Full Service Condominium features a 10,000 Square Foot, State of The Art, "Fifth Avenue Club" which includes Pool & Jacuzzi, Health Club, Coed Sauna, Massage Rooms, Yoga & Aerobics Facility, Children's Playroom, Terrace, and Lounge w/ Fireplace, Catering Center & Pool Table and Screening Room. Garage in Building. Enjoy Convenient living by being just minutes from Madison Square Park, Public Transportation with nearby subway lines which include the 6/B/D/F/M/N/Q /R/W, Fine Shops, Gourmet Restaurants & Top Supermarkets; including Fairway, H-Mart, Trader Joe's & Whole Foods.

Imagine admiring the spectacular sunsets over Three Mile Harbor from a spacious waterfront modern house. The property sits at the end of a very private and quiet street, and is bordered with the waterfront beach and nature preserve. The inviting two-story modern style house offers an open living room with floor-to-ceiling windows boasting water views and breathtaking sunsets, the glass doors leading onto a wrap-around deck. The adjacent dining area leads into a kitchen with sliding doors. The first floor also offers a bedroom with en-suite bathroom, additional powder room and wet bar. The second floor has four bedrooms and two bathrooms. Enjoy the privilege of the heated pool area, surrounded with tall vegetation offering privacy. The house sits on very quiet beach, making it ideal for swimming, kayaking or paddle boarding. Boat enthusiasts will appreciate proximity of several marinas and possibility of mooring right in front of the property on navigable water to Gardiner's Bay. Located ideally on the east side of Three Mile Harbor the property is conveniently close to several waterfront restaurants and shops and is just minutes to the village.

Designed by famed architect, Grosvenor Atterbury in 1901, this 33' wide townhouse features the privacy and exclusivity of a single family home while offering all the conveniences of a full service condominium. The interior design palate of neutral grays and creams has been beautifully executed and is effortlessly classic. From the breathtaking entrance foyer finished in Chambord Limestone & polished plaster, to the 5" wide white-oak planked floors throughout, the townhouse exudes sophistication. The massive chefs kitchen has Olympian White Danby Fleuri Stone countertops, and Olympian White Danby vein cut marble island and low luster white lacquer cabinetry. The kitchen has been outfitted with all top of the line appliances, such as Wolf range and oven, Sub-Zero refrigerator, freezer, and wine-cooler, Miele dishwasher, and Dornbrocht faucets. The townhouse features approximately 10,088 sq ft over four floors with both a private and public passenger elevator servicing each floor. There are currently 5 bedrooms and 5 full baths and 3 half baths. The parlor floor features over 12' ceilings with beautiful south facing floor to ceiling arched windows and there is a large private terrace off the first floor. There is no other townhouse/condominium in the city that can compare!

GREAT VIEW OF RIVER AND CITY !!! Corinthian Condominium, High Floor (52nd Floor) with Great City View and River View for this spacious alcove studio for sale!!! Full service luxury condo building with full time doorman and concierge. Outstanding luxurious grand lobby, lush landscaping and courtyard, spectacular architecture, the state of art health club with private outdoor running, jogging track - one of the best in the city - deck and fully sized swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, steam room, on site parking garage, on site dry cleaner and laundry facility !!!

Move right into this lovely floor through one bedroom home with windows and light from two exposures offering beautiful Chrysler Building and leafy green treetop views! This impressive, bright, apartment is ideally situated in a well-run, supremely attentive 24 hour doorman building in Turtle Bay. This home has it all: kitchen with ample cabinetry and countertops; an oversized living room with adjacent dining area, perfect for easy living and entertaining; a bath with pedestal sink and soaking tub; king sized bedroom overlooking pin drop quiet gardens, closets galore, and gleaming oak floors throughout. If a super-prime location (near Whole Foods, East River walk/bike paths, restaurants and transportation) is a must, and a crisp, clean, fresh, inviting home in a well-served, pet-friendly, building is a priority, then this ready-to-move-right-in residence is a must-see! Lounge on the beautiful rooftop garden with panoramic views of NYC! This is East Side Bliss! Sorry no guarantors or co purchasing.

Lovely one bedroom, one bath with north east exposure and partial view of Jackie Robinson Park. The apartment has a renovated galley kitchen design with original cabinets. The bathroom is also renovated with new fixtures. The natural light and wood flooring throughout the apartment offers warmth to the space. The building has a 24 hour concierge and doorman, elevator, laundry room facility, garage, storage space and bike room. Public Transportation: A,C, B, and D subway trains will get you to midtown in approximately 22 minutes. The IRT number 1 train is accessible on Broadway. There is also the cross town Bx19 and M3 bus as an alternative to the subway. The building was built in the 1950's and has a nice lobby area with 14 floors with three towers totally 236 units. The apartment is ideal for a first time buyer or an established professional looking for a easier commute to downtown or a buyer interested in subletting after two years of residence. No matter what is your reason to live at Hillview Towers you will love this new home and will enjoy living in Historic Hamilton Heights. An established community offering Starbucks, Bank of America, Capital One, New York Sports Club, Food Town, Riverbank Recreation Center, trendy restaurants and more. Call for a showing appointment today!!

Enormous mint condition three bedroom, three full bath condominium loft with towering ceilings, huge open kitchen, fireplace, central air conditioning, large separate mud room with full-size side by side washer/dryer and broad southern exposure with amazing light throughout the day. This home was recently renovated leaving no stone unturned, using the finest materials. As soon as you enter you'll be captivated by the broad scale of the living room, incredibly high ceilings, interesting columns, large windows and wide plank reclaimed wood floors. The open kitchen features stone counters, custom cabinets, farmhouse sink and stainless steel appliances. A gallery leads to large large bedrooms, including a king-sized master with walk-thru dressing room, and five piece spa-like mater bath. Secondary bedrooms are equally large. Best of all this home is pin-drop quiet. Also available is a separately deeded parking space large enough for three separate vehicles asking $650,000. Located right in the middle of Tribeca on N Moore between Varick and Hudson, some of the best restaurants in the world are right downstairs.

XXX MINT + UNOBSTRUCTED OPEN CITY VIEWS + LOCATION = YOUR NEW HOME!

Gut renovated 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom co-op with stunning North/West views in one of the most sky scraping hi-rise buildings on the Upper East Side, The Fontaine.

This apartment features a beautiful renovation with recessed lighting throughout, new floors, stainless steel appliances including a Sub Zero refrigerator and a Bosch Dishwasher, new Air Conditioning units, a spa-like bathroom and stunning city views from EVERY room.

The building amenities include, Full Time doorman, Porters, Laundry Room, Gym, Bike Storage, and a Finished Roof Top with stunning views of Manhattan.

Sublets, Pied A Terres, and Pets Allowed! Easy commute with new 2nd Avenue Q subway line!

Located in the Lumiere, the prized boutique luxury condominium in the heart of midtown west, this rarely available two bedroom two bathroom loft offers private terraces on both sides of the home. With its highly sought after winged bedroom layout, approximately 10-foot ceilings, beautiful blonde bamboo floors, and state-of-the-art finishes, this home is a sanctuary of serenity and luxury. The south-facing floor-to-ceiling windows offset a large, private terrace that runs the entire length of the master bedroom. The master offers a luxurious en-suite, spa-level bathroom equipped with a double vessel sink, glass stall shower, and a Kohler deep soaking tub for two. The second bedroom provides access to another, equally well-appointed bathroom. The open kitchen showcases high-quality design including custom ebony Wenge cabinetry, thick Calacatta slab marble countertops, and stainless steel appliances and fixture. The home is equipped with self-contained three zone central heat and air conditioning, a Bosch washer/dryer, and pre-wiring for an audio-visual system. The home is filled with brilliant sunlight, and provides partial views of midtown and beyond. Finally, a private storage unit is conveyed with the sale. The Lumiere is a full-service boutique condominium with a 24-hour doorman, resident super, a fingerprint-access gym, bike room, an electronically locked package/delivery closet, and Fresh Direct cold storage in lobby.

Located in Melrose section of the south-west Bronx, offered is a well maintained 2 family house, built in 1899+/-, that has been in the current family for almost 5 decades. It is comprised of a 3 bedroom apartment (2 bedroom, study and nursery) over a 2 bedroom apartment having access to the rear yard. The full finished basement has a separate entrance from the front and cellar doors in the rear. Each apartment has: 10'+/- ceilings, a windowed eat-in kitchen, a windowed full bathroom and a washer/dryer hook up. Rents include heat & hot water. The house is gated and comes equipped with a DVR video surveillance system having 7 cameras located in and around the house. 6,708+/- SF of available air rights makes this a development opportunity! Close to all!! Walk to the BX41 bus at Melrose Ave & E158th St, the BX6-SBS & BX6 buses at E161 St & Melrose Ave and the BX21 bus at 3rd Ave & E158th St. A short walk to Yankee Stadium for the B, D & 4 trains at E161st St, the Melrose Metro-North railroad Harlem Line at E162nd St & Park Ave, the 2 & 5 trains as well as shops at 3rd Ave & E149th Street "The Hub", Lincoln Hospital at E149th St & Park Ave and the Bronx Terminal Market (Gateway Mall) at E149th and Exterior Streets. Easy access to the Major Deegan and Bruckner Expressway.

The time is now to buy this lovely home with community beach access. Beautiful two bedroom, one large bath main home with separate guest living space with bath. Hardwood floors throughout, detached 1.5 car garage, rear patio, professional landscaped property, water view, close to beach.

Turn key three bedroom, two bath home - be in for summer. The main house has a lovely eat in kitchen with breakfast nook, large bright living room, two bedrooms and one bath. A renovated separate space has a kitchenette, living area, large bedroom a full bath. A perfect mother daughter. Won't last at this price!!

Tucked away in a secret mews is this triple mint two bedroom two bath loft with wood-burning fireplace, central-air conditioning, beamed ceilings, private washer dryer and exposed brick. As you walk into your welcoming entry foyer, you're led into a large corner living room facing south-west. An enormous open kitchen has stone counters, custom cabinets, integrated appliances and externally vented professional-grade range. Sliding glass door open onto a Juliet balcony overlooking neighboring gardens. The large master bedroom has custom closets and a stunning ensuite master bath. A generous second bedroom is perfect for children, guests or a home office. 37B Crosby is a well maintained boutique building that will make you feel like you've stepped back in time. Residents have private storage and all the convenience of being in the middle of SoHo with none of the noise. Whole Foods is minutes away. Nearby trains include the 6/N/R/W/Q/B/D/F/M.

Five-star meticulously renovated 2-story, 2/3 bedroom dream oasis in South Battery Park with phenomenal direct river views and tremendous outdoor space! Be engulfed in luxury overlooking the Hudson from walls of picture windows, and your own private rooftop paradise that wraps around the upper level. Enjoy peaceful relaxation or lavish entertaining on the huge one-of-a-kind landscaped terrace spanning nearly 2300 sf, with a large raised sundeck and raised Zen spa deck draped with 100-year-old ivy. Soak up the sun or indulge in the outdoor Jacuzzi while gazing at the water, then get refreshed in the outdoor shower! A gracious entry gallery with a powder room and generous closets introduces the dramatic first-floor living space graced by high ceilings, a sleek modern kitchen, and light-drenched western living/dining with gorgeous water vistas. Custom cabinetry and built-ins throughout the home are made of rare and exquisite Macassar Ebony wood from Africa. The quiet upstairs houses a fabulous corner river-fronting master suite graced by beautiful mahogany cabinetry and a spa bath, a spacious bedroom and an elegant guest full bath. The original layout of this penthouse was 3 bed,/ 3.5 bath, but the current owner converted it to a 2 bed/ 2.5 bath. It can be easily transformed back to a 3 bedroom if desired.
Liberty Terrace at 380 Rector Place stands 26 stories on the water's edge. Residents enjoy extensive amenities that include full-time doorman and concierge service, a live-in super, riverfront fitness center, club room with an indoor-outdoor swimming pool, and an outdoor deck with a retractable sunroof. The address is outstanding, near parks, the Hudson River promenade, and world-class shopping and dining offered at the amazing Westfield featuring Eataly, and the new Brookfield Place with a European-style marketplace, Le District. Pets are permitted.Liberty Terrace at 380 Rector Place stands 26 stories on the water's edge. Residents enjoy extensive amenities that include full-time doorman and concierge service, a live-in super, riverfront fitness center, club room with an indoor-outdoor swimming pool, and an outdoor deck with a retractable sunroof. The address is outstanding, near parks, the Hudson River promenade, and world-class shopping and dining offered at the amazing Westfield featuring Eataly, and the new Brookfield Place with a European-style marketplace, Le District. Pets are permitted.

Two bedroom loft in mint condition with private terrace, full-time doorman, huge windows, high ceilings and private laundry. Step into the entry foyer and be led into the enormous south-facing corner living room and out onto your enormous terrace. The large open kitchen has new stainless steel appliances, custom cabinets, stone counters and wine fridge. The bright master bedroom is large and gracious but is also completely quiet, perfect for a good night's rest. 380 West 12th is a well maintained pet friendly building with full-time doorman, beautiful common roof deck, live-in superintendent, on-site storage, and it's just half a block from the Hudson River Promenade and minutes from the Meatpacking District. This is the West Village at its finest.

Live on the Park. Immaculate renovations throughout this postwar condominium apartment originated from Architects Skidmore, Owings & Merrill. NO BOARD APPROVAL AND NO APPLICATION PROCESS. Enjoy Central Park at its finest and views from this south facing spacious one bedroom. Featuring an open kitchen with top of the line appliances, expansive custom built closets and hardwood floors. This prime address located within the newly constructed Columbus Square retail shopping complex, which is comprised of Whole Foods, Starbucks, Home Goods, Michaels, Models, Sephora and much more. 382 Central Park West is a full service building which amenities include 24 Hour Doorman, Bike Room, Driveway, Parking Lot, Courtyard, Garden, Fitness Room, Laundry Room, Playroom, Playground, Lounge, and Private Storage. Convenient to all NYC MTA Transit. Please call today for a private showing.

With as many as five bedrooms, five full baths, a formal dining room, and an enormous corner living room, this once in a lifetime opportunity at the historic Apthorp has just come available for the first time. At over 4,500 square feet, this space is one of the largest contiguous corner units on the Upper West Side, and perfect for dinner parties, benefits or simply relaxing at home. With the perfect balance of incredible proportions, character, light, view, location and building pedigree, this home represents a collector quality residence that you will seldom see.

Currently a wide open flexible space, this is at a stage that enables you to bring in your architect to create your dream home rather than paying a premium for the finished product only to have to redo it to suit your needs.

Plans by renowned architect Alex Stojanovic have been designed to take advantage of the sweeping corner facing west toward Riverside Park, incorporating a large formal dining room and huge windowed eat-in kitchen. Entertaining is seamless in the adjacent media room with a bar or fifth bedroom.

Facing West, the generous secondary bedrooms each have ensuite baths.

A truly spectacular master bedroom faces east over the landscaped Apthorp gardens and is pin-drop quiet. The adjacent sitting area is the perfect place to read a book. Dual walk-in closets will make anyone with a penchant for fashion eternally happy.

The Apthorp is to New York City what the Pitti Palace is to Florence; a breathtaking icon steeped in architectural history and magnificent details. One of the few buildings in the city to sit on an entire city block, from 78th to 79th and Broadway to West End, it was added to the National Register of Historical Places in 1978. A large landscaped courtyard enables residents to drive through the porte-cochere, passed the guardhouse, and be dropped off inside the park-like privacy unlike any other residence in the city.

Incredible scale, history and exacting standards come together in this generous three bedroom with three full and one half bath fit for diplomats, celebrities and families alike. Twenty-four hour staff including full-time doorman, live-in superintendent and porters provide unrivaled service. The just completed renovation incorporated the finest materials and restoration of period details including custom baseboard and crown moldings, chevron pattern inlaid oak floors, eight foot solid core paneled doors, marble mantels, decorative ceilings and tasteful marble baths, central air-conditioning and private laundry.

Enter into a large foyer and be led into the ballroom-like living room with its high ceilings, decorative fireplace, huge windows and western exposure with incredible light pouring in throughout the day. Host events or intimate gatherings and make a seamless transition into your adjacent formal dining room large enough to comfortably seat twelve.

Chef's will delight in the perfectly appointed separate eat-in kitchen with custom cabinets, stone counters and stainless steel integrated appliances.

An enormous master suite with another decorative fireplace is so big will make you think you've moved to the suburbs. The five piece master bath features side by side vanity, separate soaking tub and shower. An enormous walk-in closet is the piece de resistance. The second and third bedrooms are both extremely generous.

The Apthorp is to New York City what the Pitti Palace is to Florence; a breathtaking icon steeped in architectural history and magnificent details. One of the few buildings in the city to sit on an entire city block, from 78th to 79th and Broadway to West End, it was added to the National Register of Historical Places in 1978. A large landscaped courtyard enables residents to drive through the porte-cochere, passed the guardhouse, and be dropped off inside the park-like privacy unlike any other residence in the city.

This is a turnkey home ready for you to bring your suitcase.

STUNNING CONTEMPORARY LOFT desirably situated just south of Madison Square Park and Fifth Avenue. Loft 10C is the extraordinary embodiment of sleek, innovative, and modern design. This one bedroom, two bath sanctuary with 10 foot ceilings and massive walls of glass in the heart of the Flatiron District awaits! Entertaining is seamless and stylish in the window walled spacious living and dining room. The impeccably designed chef's kitchen is a masterful work of art with custom Poliform Varenna cabinetry, Pied Auberge stone countertops, Sub-Zero fridge and Miele dishwasher. The epitome of chic, the generously-sized master bedroom boasts three spacious closets. The Zen inspired bathroom indulges you with a warm marble vanity, double integrated sinks, heated floors, a deep soaking tub and separate shower. A welcoming foyer, gleaming hardwood floors, CAC, large closets and a Bosch washer dryer complete this incredible residence. 4W21 is ideally located at the crossroads of Manhattan's most desirable neighborhoods of Gramercy Park and Union Square. Upon entry to this 17 story glass tower, the gorgeous lobby sets the tone. Exclusive amenities include: a supremely attentive super, 24-hour doorman and concierge, a fully-equipped fitness center, onsite parking garage, beautifully landscaped terrace with children's playground. Close to subways, restaurants and shopping. Pet friendly too. This full-service condop building offers condo rules and allows subletting, co-purchasing, parent-purchasing and pied-a terres. Excellent land lease with 86 years remaining! Luxury living at its finest. Please note, actual monthly maintenance is $3,954 with the seller offering a $2000 month contribution for one year.

Live on the Park. Luxurious renovations throughout this postwar condominium apartment originated from Architects Skidmore, Owings & Merrill. NO BOARD APPROVAL AND NO APPLICATION PROCESS. Enjoy Central Park at its finest and direct park views from this north facing spacious one bedroom including private terrace. Featuring an open kitchen with top of the line appliances, expansive custom built closets and hardwood floors. This prime address located within the newly constructed Columbus Square retail shopping complex, which is comprised of Whole Foods, Starbucks, Home Goods, Michaels, Models, Sephora and much more. 400 Central Park West is a full service building which amenities include 24 Hour Doorman, Bike Room, Driveway, Parking Lot, Courtyard, Garden, Fitness Room, Laundry Room, Playroom, Playground, Lounge, and Private Storage. Convenient to all NYC MTA Transit. Please call today for a private showing

This fabulous studio is a prime example of the building's classic yet contemporary apartments with hardwood floors, w/d oversized windows, great views and refined finishes at Manhattan's most popular Upper East Side condominium, the sophisticated Laurel at 400 East 67th between First & York is perfect for the New Yorker with an active lifestyle and thirst for luxury.

With an 11,000 SF fitness facility (The Trophy Club) with a bi-level triathlon training center, 2 custom-designed resistance pools, an Infinity 50 lap pool, state-of-the-art equipment & sauna/steam room, you can work out on a whim. Or have some fun in the exclusive entertainment and recreation area (The Laurel Club) that offers a double-height atrium lounge with a plasma TV, sound system, film & book library, screening room, dining/conference room, toddler craft club house, game room with custom designed billiards & football tables, arcade & computer room.

Designed by award-winning architects Costas Kondylis Partners, the 31-story Laurel is not only striking with its glass and Indiana limestone façade but is also LEED-certified, with many eco-friendly elements in its construction and energy-saving systems throughout.

Beautifully renovated Studio, on the Upper East Side, with very Low Maintenance for sale at 401 E.74 Owners Corp. Facing east and the beautiful courtyard garden, this lovely home gets morning light. REAL 2 BRM UNDER $1M! RAISED MEZZANINE LEVEL APT! RECENTLY TOTALLY RENOVATED CHARMING PRE-WAR. Hallway leads to a large living room, separate dining area, high ceilings, beautiful oak wood floors. A sprawling, sun filled, high floor condo apartment with spectacular wide ranging views of the East River, Queens and New York City skyscrapers. Beyond Special! Truly Unique! Prewar Home unlike any other on UES. Major Home for Entertaining!! Full Floor 2 BR/2 BA (can Be 3BR) LOFT Like Home has Private entry & private elevator. A beautiful Master Bath & blissful quiet as you face into the South Gardens. There are plenty of apartments in NYC but this one is truly something to be seen.

This beautiful corner one bedroom, one and a half bath apartment offers wonderful light through northern and western exposures. The apartment has hardwood floors, 9.5 foot ceilings, floor to ceiling windows, marble bathrooms, windowed kitchen and ability to add a washer and dryer. Reminiscent of a nicely updated California Ranch House on the inside (only larger), overlooking Cuyler Gore park, this massive true 3 bedroom 1.5 bath condo has low monthlies. Featuring an open bar kitchen, large rooms, and abundant closet space. With no doubt this is a rare opportunity for a real home in a premium Brooklyn location.

The triple-sized main living space comfortably accommodates many possible configurations of Living, Dining, and Home Office furniture. There are 2 windows (one is a large bay window). The windows frame southern, seasonally alternating views- landmarked skyline and park greenery. The oak plank flooring has been refinished in antique grey.

The open bar kitchen was renovated last year with black sparkle stone surfaces, hand glazed subway tile backsplash, GE Profile stainless appliances and dishwasher, and Driftwood grey cabinetry.

The 1.5 bathrooms are clean white porcelain tile accented in charcoal black with nickel and chrome accents. The half bath is part of a master suite and will comfortably convert to a full bath (board approval required). Washer and Dryer hookups may be installed (board approval required).

The king sized bedrooms face a quiet rear courtyard and have fossilized bamboo flooring and each have large 7 foot closets, and the master bedroom features a walk in closet.

This kind of layout in a residential area so close to the nexus of all Brooklyn- the Barclays Center/Atla, Downtown, and take in all Brooklyn has to offer.

Owners have access to a common complex courtyard & laundry room, along with an outdoor area to park your bike.

Cats Only, no dogs. 1 stoop up, then 2 flights up.

417 Park Avenue is a classic Emery Roth Building. Apartment 4E has been meticulously renovated to an elegant reimaging of a classic six. This coveted architectural gem enjoys a prime Midtown address on Park Avenue between 54th and 55th Streets. Pets and pied à terres permitted.

Welcome Home! After a day of conquering Manhattan, arriving home to this beautiful spacious THREE bedroom PREWAR CONDO just steps from Central Park will be a delight in every way. The kitchen includes custom cabinetry, granite countertops, breakfast bar, stainless steel premium appliances, Fisher & Paykel refrigerator, Viking stove, double drawer dishwasher and under counter wine refrigerator. The adjacent windowed dining room comfortably seats 6-8. Enjoying an ideal split bedroom layout, relax and unwind in the tranquil master bedroom which enjoys leafy green treetop views and two large closets and can easily be combined with the adjacent room into a huge master suite. Two more comfortable bedrooms round out this stylish stunner, one of which enjoys an ensuite windowed bath. A welcoming foyer, crown and baseboard moldings, gleaming light oak floors, ALL California closets, state of the art surround sound system. A laundry room with Bosch washer and dryer complete this special residence. Now is your opportunity to own a wonderful West End Avenue Penthouse duplex in a 19th Century Beaux Arts Co-Op. This renovated apartment with an open-concept main floor is designed for comfortable living and entertaining. As you enter this warm and inviting home you are greeted by the spaciousness of the living and dining with wood-burning fireplace, 9.5' ceilings, exposed brick wall and original plank flooring; a kitchen with high end appliances, large island with granite counter tops, and cherry wood cabinets. Continue the ambiance directly above while you dine and relax alfresco on the large private terrace with an additional storage closet. This home also includes two large main level bedrooms with 1 bath and an upstairs master bedroom suite including a walk-in closet, an en-suite marble bath, honed granite double sink vanity, spa tub, Hudson River views and a private all-season sun room adjacent to the larger outdoor terrace. There is additional, well thought out storage for all the extras. A 1/2 bathroom addition on the first level may be possible with board approval. This duplex penthouse home is sure to meet all of your expectations, while enjoying bright eastern and western exposures, open views and the convenience of being located on one of the city's best Upper West Side blocks right in heart of a sought-after, vibrant residential neighborhood - - near Riverside and Central Parks, transportation, restaurants, shopping (Zabar's, Fairway, Citarella and West Side Market) 425 WEA is a boutique, 7 story, 28 unit, friendly co-op with video security, a live-in superintendent (who receives packages), laundry on each floor and bike room. Be the first to see this gorgeous few year old East Village Condo near the Tompkins square Park. *Elevator* *Private Balcony* *Shared Roof Deck* *Private Storage Space* Apartment features sleek concrete floors with epoxy finishes and floor to ceiling double pane windows. Situated on 1.65 oceanfront acres with endless ocean and bay views replete with refreshing breezes, this spacious 5 bedroom, 6 bath retreat offers an abundance of amenities inside and out for you and your guests! Upon entering, you are instantaneously welcomed by the open floorplan with kitchen, living & dining areas where the interior seamlessly transitions to the outdoors with oversized windows giving way to truly spectacular views. The custom staircase doubles as a work of art as it elegantly leads you upstairs to the spacious guest rooms, study, balconies and of course the luxurious master suite!
