Sales office located at 438 East 12th Street, entrance on 11th Street.

This 1,686 square foot three-bedroom, two and a half bath residence designed by Paris Forino offers ceilings up to 10'7 and 1500 square feet of private outdoor space. Oversized casement windows framed in statuary bronze offer sun-filled eastern and western exposures. Designed for entertaining, the spacious living and dining area open up onto the enormous 1,500 square foot terrace featuring outdoor cabinetry with a built-in gas barbecue grill and custom landscaping. Exceptional interior features include seven-inch-wide plank European white oak flooring, 8' high interior doors with burnished brass hardware and custom architectural millwork throughout. Satin lacquer custom Italian cabinetry, limestone and Calacatta marble countertops and blackened metal hardware compose the expertly crafted open kitchen equipped with appliances by Wolf, Bosch and Sub-Zero. The master suite is a true sanctuary with an en-suite master bath highlighted by luminous design details. The serene space features herringbone Bianco Dolomiti mosaic floors complemented by the luxury of radiant heat, and Bianco Dolomiti-clad walls. A custom white lacquer Italian vanity cabinet with blackened metal accents and ample storage is topped by stunning Calacatta Ice marble. The second bath is finished with Bianco Carrara honed marble mosaic walls and floor, a Corbata Nero marble framed vanity mirror and a cerused white oak Italian vanity topped by Bianco Dolomiti. The dramatic powder room design offers watercolor glazed penny round mosaic walls, custom lighting and a corner-wrapping vanity mirror. A utility closet with washer/dryer completes this brilliantly-designed residence.

A private retreat in the East Village, Steiner East Village offers 82 residences ranging from one to four-bedroom condominiums and penthouses in New York's most eclectic, intriguing and authentic neighborhood. Developed by Steiner NYC, Steiner East Village is a partnership of sought after talents in architecture and design, with residential interiors and amenities by Paris Forino Interior Design, architecture by S9 Architects and landscape architecture by Future Green Studio. This full-service condominium will feature dual marquee entrances on 11th and 12th Streets, with a 24-hour concierge and live-in resident manager. Residents will experience over 16,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor amenities including a teak-ribbed indoor pool overlooking a private park-like garden, spa sanctuary with steam and sauna, 2,000 square foot state-of-the-art fitness center programmed by FitLore Health and Wellness, resident's library with fireplace and a children's playroom. Private outdoor spaces include an over 5,000 square foot rooftop park and 3,000 square foot resident courtyard.

Entry Level
Designed for grand entertaining and breathtaking views, this 6,387 sq. ft., 4-story home (4,412 interior sq. ft and 1,975 sq. ft exterior) is known for its Midtown brilliance. As you walk into the grand entry foyer of this apartment, you are greeted with custom brass stairway banisters, a private elevator and elegant furnishings, setting the stage for the beauty before you.

Floor One
The main floor establishes the attention to detail that is present throughout this exquisite home. As you step into the living room, sunlight streams through the space from the floor to ceiling windows and you instinctively admire the garden outside on the terrace. Solid Brazilian cherry wood floors, a detailed Mahogany accent wall, high-definition projector and screen, as well as a custom built bar made with black lacquer and exquisite green marble are some of the features worth noting in this grand living space. The centerpiece of the inviting dining room is a French-Deco Mahogany table and leads to a Chef's dream kitchen expertly equipped with top of the line appliances, a custom wine fridge, Glassos counter tops and an oversized white marble island. Off of the kitchen, you can enjoy the private outdoor seating area and entertainment space.

Floor Two
This entire floor is designed as a master suite making this area hard to leave in the morning. The large sitting room connects the two sides of the floor creating a seamless flow from room to room. The expansive master bedroom offers an abundance of natural light and is surrounded by de Gournay gold-leafed hand painted wallpaper. The master bedroom also includes various oversized windows, a washer/dryer, ample custom closets and a powder room just steps from your bedside. As you walk through the sitting room admiring the cityscape through the windows, you are greeted to two large custom walk-in closets. With custom lighting, Sonos speakers, built-in shelves, wall-to-wall space for a dozen wardrobes or more and unparalleled views, this could be one of your favorite features in the apartment! The master bathroom is just beyond the walk-in closets and is of unmatched quality in the City. The centerpiece is an oversized soaking tub with skylight above and features custom Waterworks brass fixtures resembling a spa retreat. The bathroom incorporates dual marble sinks, Greenhouse ceilings, rain shower, white lacquered custom cabinets and hand-picked tile flooring. The bathroom terrace will surprise you with the refreshing resistance swimming pool and the Empire State Building views that seem almost touchable from the water's edge.

Floor Three and Four
The third floor has two dedicated outdoor terraces, a second master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and balcony, as well a third bedroom currently purposed as a study. When you reach the third floor it reinforces how much thought and care went into this three year multi-million dollar renovation. The fun and lively décor flows perfectly as you navigate the apartment but each room has its own individual style and personality. The magic of this apartment is evident in all the consideration every detail has received. The top floor encompasses a petite powder room but is almost entirely devoted to the 1,000+ sq. ft. outdoor terrace. The sensational outdoor space is large enough to host a dinner party and features an outdoor bar, fire-pit perfect for breezy summer nights and the most dramatic Chrysler and Empire State Building views found in Midtown. Relish in the hours spent outdoors in the six outdoor terraces and two balconies as you take in the sweeping city views in this gem in the sky.

Excellent bus and subway transportation include the 1 train (around the corner) and the B and C trains on Central Park West.

Priced to sell, this is the best priced and only east facing two bedroom available in the building. Perched on the 30th floor lies this chic, never lived in residence of 1,668 square feet, 2 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms.
When you enter the home, you are welcomed to a bright entrance foyer with captivating views of the Williamsburg Bridge. To your left is one of the most beautiful powder rooms designed in new development.
The long gallery allows the opportunity for art, and leads you to an open living and dining area featuring corner views, floor to ceiling windows, 11 foot ceilings and a large balcony. With triple exposures of South, East and West, there are magnificent views throughout the apartment of iconic Manhattan Landmarks including the Chrysler Building, Williamsburg Bridge, Freedom Tower, and the Hudson River.
The Herzog & de Meuron custom interiors left no detail unattended. The kitchen is outfitted with a sculptural floating Absolute Black Granite kitchen island, Corian counter tops, with modern, yet elegant finishes. Enjoy top of the line appliances from Sub-Zero and Miele, including a washer and dryer.
The large master bedroom has beautiful views of the Hudson River and features two expansive walk in closets. The ensuite master bath greets you with travertine and radiant heated floors and leads you to a windowed modern spa-like experience never before seen with a sleek soaking tub and separate shower. Enjoy picturesque sunsets from a terraced guest bedroom or study with its own full ensuite bathroom.
The residence features a 4-pipe heating and cooling system for year round multi-zone climate control. 56 Leonard has already solidified itself as a modern masterpiece, and the jewel of lower Manhattan. Designed by the iconic Herzog & Meuron 56 Leonard soars high above prime Tribeca.
56 Leonard provides an exclusive lifestyle with 17,000 sq. feet of amenities including fitness center, yoga studio, treatment rooms, steam room and sauna, a library lounge, private dining/conference room with a catering kitchen, theater, children's play room, Sky Estuary, and 75-foot infinity-edge lap pool with a landscaped outdoor sundeck and soaking spa. 56 Leonard has quickly become a New York City staple, 30B-east is the perfect opportunity to be a part of this exclusive residence.

This one-of-a-kind 3,397 SF, 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath duplex residence features a beautiful private terrace and stunning north and west views of the river and Downtown skyline through 10' floor to ceiling windows. A private elevator vestibule leads to a breathtaking corner great room with an eat-in kitchen and dining area ideal for entertaining and daily living. The corner great room overlooks a spectacular 2,200 SF terrace with 25' saltwater pool and outdoor shower. The second floor is home to a sophisticated master bedroom suite that offers a large walk in closet and floor to ceiling windows facing west allowing for stunning sunsets and light. The windowed 5-fixture master bathroom features an elongated custom white oak vanity with integrated double sinks, Muse by Kos deep soaking tub, separate oversized shower, private water closet and radiant heated floors. The gracious and well-proportioned second and third bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and large closet systems.This exceptional home is also complete with a high capacity washer, vented dryer, and a multi-zoned heating and cooling system. 565 Broome Soho is designed by award winning architect, Renzo Piano. Backed by his team at Renzo Piano Building Workshop, he recently designed The Whitney Museum of American Art in New York City in addition to designing many of the world's most recognized and celebrated properties. 565 Broome Soho will be Renzo Piano's first residential building in New York City. Our location in highly sought after Soho mixes the best of restaurants, high end luxury retailers and neighborhood services that are part of day to day life. 565 Broome Soho is in very close proximity to Hudson River Park with many recreational opportunities including biking and jogging paths and playgrounds. Renzo Piano has created a 30 story building with 115 residences, the building standing 290 feet makes it the tallest residential building in Soho. The façade, curtain wall, is comprised of low iron extra wide glass which is almost like crystal and allows for optimal clarity. There are no harsh corners in the design of 565 Broome Soho - the corners are rounded using non-segmented glass which can give the resident the feeling of floating over Manhattan.Amenities include a spacious lobby designed by Renzo Piano with a 24-hour concierge and attended lobby with double height glass that allows for plenty of natural light. Other amenities include a private gated driveway and a porte cochere that is beautifully planted and landscaped, a 55-foot indoor swimming pool on the 9th floor with men's and women's sauna and steam. Off of the 9th floor the building has a 1200 SF landscaped sunning terrace. On the 7th floor there is a fitness center, yoga/stretching room and a children's playroom. A stunning conservatory/curated library for residents only has 92' ceilings, a live wall with growth lighting as well as ambient lighting plus a social room, media room and a caterer's kitchen. The building also has automated parking for purchase.

Easily convertible to a 3 bedroom, this spacious duplex condo in a relaxed elevator building on the Prospect Heights/Crown Heights border has all the space you need. With over 1300 sq ft this smartly configured space has two nicely sized bedrooms, an open lounge/play space, and a half bath on the parlor floor; downstairs there's a large living space, kitchen, and full bath. A door to the common hallway provides easy access to the building's storage rooms, laundry and common garden. There's room for your imagination here: the ample floorpan lends itself to many potential configurations. In consultation with your architect, you may decide to relocate the kitchen to the parlor floor, expand the half bath to a full bath, create three bedrooms, or add an in-unit washer/dryer.

Conveniently located just two blocks to the C train at Clinton/Washington, or a pleasant stroll through Prospect Heights to the B/Q or 2/3 train, this apartment puts you within an easy walk of the best that Brooklyn has to offer including the Brooklyn Museum, the Botanic Garden, Prospect Park, and Barclays Center. Favorite restaurants and bars like Tom's, Plant Love House, Olmstead, Bearded Lady, Aita, the Vanderbilt, and El Atoradero are all within easy reach.

This duplex is truly a unique find, perfect for an investor or homebuyer in search of a great location and space. Opportunity abounds!

600 West End Avenue Penthouse Top 3 Floors w 4 Terraces 3-4 Bedroom 2.5 Bath 4 Exposures Fantastic Views incl. River Wood Burning Fireplace One of a kind Beachlike Penthouse home atop one of WEA's AAA prewar coop's. Sunlight floods this award wining multi-level home. 4 terraces comprising over 2000 sf surround all major rms (perfect for the gardening fanatic). Classic Midcentury Modern kitchen with Lacewood cabinetry opens to corner living rm w/WBFP. Informal dining rm opens to a huge S/W terrace. 3 bdrms (all accessible to terraces) plus a den/artists studio also with a terr plus river & open city vus. Circa 1910 White Glove Full Service & Staffed Pet Friendly Coop Building

Enter from your key-locked elevator into a grand three bedroom loft with towering ceilings, three exposures and south-facing living room flooded with light. Walk past your large open kitchen and private laundry room into a second north-facing sitting room and adjacent dining area. Three large windowed bedrooms are pin-drop quiet. A generous walk-in closet between the master and second is larger than some private storage areas. This space has been the long-term residence and studio of one of Soho's few remaining true artists and is the perfect opportunity for buyers looking for space that will enable them to make it their own. Located on in the heart of SoHo on Grand Street between Wooster and West Broadway, a selection of the world's best restaurants, shopping and entertainment are literally at your doorstep. Transportation options are endless with the A, C, E, N, R, W, 1 and 6 each within minutes.

Introducing 64 East, an exclusive boutique collection of six full-floor residences with private outdoor terraces situated in the nexus of the Bowery District. 64 East offers a cutting edge design philosophy that is applied with the first smartphone based video technology within the heart of one the most thriving neighborhoods of downtown New York City. 64 East epitomizes both the history and perpetually changing landscape that is New York, reflecting the heritage of this iconic thoroughfare in a forward, modern design.

These floor through, 1,807 square-foot lofts offer two bedrooms and a home office/convertible third bedroom, with two bathrooms plus powder room. The layouts provide a well thought-out sophisticated floor plan with keyed elevator entrance directly into the residence. The sprawling and dramatic great room, just over 23' x 23' of living space is set apart by deep set, floor-to-ceiling casement windows that elevate and cement the quality of these lofts. These are light-filled homes with contemporary details that illuminate downtown living. One's own private terrace provides a welcome reprieve. With its open-plan living, kitchen and dining concept, window walls that allow abundant natural light to pour in, and ceiling heights maximized by revealing the structural beams, the interiors of 64 East are defined by polished materials, expansiveness and natural light.

Designed for ease and entertaining, 64 East offers sleek kitchens that are comprised of Stevali European-style cabinetry, a Pental quartz countertop accented by an Artistic Tile backslash, with a Wolf 30 inch Dual-Fuel Range, Sub-Zero 36 inch bottom mount refrigerator, Sharp 24 inch microwave drawer and a Bosch 24 inch dishwasher. Bathrooms at 64 East are an inviting haven for clean simplicity and surprising dimension, with classic design elements like subway tiles, floating cabinetry, and gleaming, all-nickel plumbing hardware with cross handles and escutcheon plates from Waterworks' distinctive Ludlow collection.

Resident amenities include in-residence vented washer and dryer, a Virtual Doorman by ButterflyMX offering secure smartphone based video technology that allow residents to monitor guests and deliveries from their own handled device, and an on-site fitness center with an entertainment system and equipment by Gym Source.

Gorgeous two bedroom, 1 bath located in the heart of Woodside! This residence has pre-war charm with an excellent layout, oversized windows and great closet space. The bedrooms are on opposite ends of the apartment and the kitchen has an open concept equipped with a dishwasher and breakfast bar. The master bedroom can easily fit a king sized bed with additional storage. The building is well maintained with amenities that include a laundry room, recreation area, and personal storage along with a bike room. Sorry, no dogs; cats are allowed. *No Subletting*Conveniently located three blocks to 61st Street express stop on the 7 Train and LIRR. Be in Manhattan in 15 mins door to door! Restaurants, nightlife and shops are just a stone throw away.

This elegant home is designed for living on a grand scale, and its views are no exception. Rising high above the Hudson, this residence features an oversized balcony that graciously expands the living area and offers breathtaking views from sunrise to sunset. Awe-inspiring protected vistas including the Hudson River, Palisades, George Washington Bridge, and Van Cortland Park. Relax, sun bathe or simply savor the panoramic views on the rooftop terrace. View the stars and planets from Solaria's private observatory with its own celestial telescope. Here, luxury living quickly becomes second nature. There are full floor to ceiling windows and extensive closets. The kitchen has cherry wood cabinetry, granite countertops and high end appliances. The master bedroom has 270 degree views and the master bath offers floor to ceiling Jerusalem stone, radiant floor heat, his and her sinks with a triple width recessed medicine cabinet, and a frameless glass shower and a large, and a soaking tub. There is a 100 sf balcony.This s a Luxury building with a fitness room, lounge/party room, 24/7 concierge and a children's playroom. Parking and Storage are available.This apartment has been in use as a pied-a-terre by the owner since the building opened and shows few signs of wear.

Picture yourself opening your very own private keyed elevator door to your expansive 1246sf one bedroom, one and one-half bath loft. A rare find in the vibrant Financial District, it is situated on a quiet block steps away from all public transportation and amenities.

First time on the market, this high-ceilinged home has a wall of beautiful large windows that come with remote shades; a wall of brick in the living room giving it character and warmth, beautiful ambient recessed lighting, making this a state of the art residence.

Galley kitchen is complete with stainless steel Dacor dishwasher and oven, Miele refrigerator and a solid surface countertop. It is the perfect set-up for the chef who enjoys preparing meals and entertaining, providing open space and room. Master bath comes with heated floors, double sinks, separate shower and tub. Bedroom comes with custom designed closet and leads onto a private 249sf outdoor terrace, furnished with outdoor rattan patio furniture and a grill. The terrace has outdoor lighting. There is beautiful wood fence atop the terrace wall giving the feel that you are in your own backyard. This unique home gives you space, privacy and beauty. Virtual Doorman.

The Financial District connects to the best of downtown living through Oculus, Westfield Place and Seaport. Amazing eateries, retail and business springing up all over. You can get anywhere in Manhattan, Brooklyn and New Jersey through the hub steps away. Tenant pays $5775 in rent. Great investment property. Ideal for a 1031 exchange.

BEST PRICED convertible 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment in the neighborhood offers amazing view (the gorgeous historic Jefferson Library building) with the oversized windows in both living room and master bedroom provide western exposure light all day. The windowed kitchen is also a rare find. This apartment is located in the heart of Greenwich Village and is in a full service doorman elevator building with the most friendly and caring staff. The building also provides garage, central laundry, and is pet friendly. Current assessment $220 per month (for 18 months) will cover a lot of upgrades like new sidewalks,and new water tower, etc. This apartment can only be shown by appointments, call today!. MAKE IT YOUR OWN!!!

South of main street Behind a row of Rhododendrons sits this magnificent offering. Featuring formal Living room with fireplace ,Den area, Chef's kitchen with top grade Viking appliances, Blue Pearl Granite counter tops. The Master is on the first floor with two guest ensuite bedrooms upstairs. The basement is finished with separate outside entrance to your own private office with full bath. Walk out back onto the mahogany deck overlooking the manicured landscape and full sized pool. There is also a two plus car attached garage that completes the package.

Superior neighborhood of Old Harbor Colony with 8 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, large wood deck, swimming pool, tennis court, indoor hot tub. One of the largest lots in the development. Private beach access to swim, launch kayacks, canoes, paddle board, rowboats.

STUNNING DESIGNER LOFT
As you approach the ornate sandstone and brick facade of Bleecker Tower with its iconic copper tower, it is already apparent that that this building is anything but ordinary. Built in the late 19th Century to house the Manhattan Savings Institution, this magnificent, monumental building was the site of one of the greatest bank heists of all time by George Leslie, the "King of the Bank Robbers?" and his band of thieves, solidifying a place in NYC lore.

Today, this legendary building has been transformed into a boutique and exclusive cooperative in the heart of NoHo with apartments that echo the grandeur of the building itself. Apartment 2E is perhaps the crown jewel of the building, benefitting from the dramatic, floor-to-ceiling arched windows that encircle the building's 2nd floor with approximately 12 ½ -foot ceilings. The colossal scale of the windows emphasizes the expanse of the loft space while simultaneously articulating the vast living room into more intimate areas with no shortage of uses.

With an incredible, open chef's kitchen featuring top of the line stainless steel appliances, including 2 ovens, 2 Fisher & Paykel dishwashers, 2 refrigerators as well as a wine refrigerator, this is a home designed for entertainment and has the capacity to cater elegant dinner or cocktail parties on an impressive scale. The hardwood cabinetry, gorgeous marble counters and center island, as well as the sophisticated finishes make this the perfect blend of beauty and functionality.

The serene master suite showcases a custom dressing room and magnificent, sparkling master bath with radiant heat marble floors, elegant Maestro Picasso soaking tub, decorative wrought iron staircase, standing shower with exquisite mosaic tile and Dorn Bracht fixtures, and La Cava double vanity.

A handsome library lined with bookshelves also features an adjoining media room and is adjacent to a fully renovated 2nd full bathroom. Complete with automated Lutron lighting and muti-zoned Sonos surround sound, new luxurious hardwood floors throughout, this trophy home also includes a powder room and washer/dryer.

This stunning home was reimagined by award-winning interior designer, Nina Serafi. Bleecker Tower features a part-time doorman, beautiful landscaped roofdeck and private storage bins. Located in the heart of NoHo, enjoy fine dining at Balthazar, BondST and Mercer Kitchen, as well as all neighborhood amenities, including Equinox, Soul Cycle, The Bowery Hotel, Crosby Street Hotel, designer shopping and so much more.

Welcome to this grand Bay Ridge home in one of the most sought after buildings in the area.

With beautiful residences designed by industry leading architects, a brand new 8-acre park, Barclays Center and dynamic neighborhood shopping and dining right in your backyard, Pacific Park has something for everyone, just steps from the 2, 3, 4, 5, B, D, N, Q, R, C, G, trains.2 Months Free and 1 Month OP on 14 Month Lease for 1 Bedrooms and 2 Bedrooms

461 DEAN

NO FEE

GUARANTORS ACCEPTED

Conceived by SHoP Architects, handcrafted locally in the Brooklyn Navy Yard, and assembled on top of 11 subway lines, 461 Dean Street offers an unrivaled residential experience in immediate proximity to the new Pacific Park in Brooklyn. As the tallest modular building in the world, 461 Dean Street affords spacious layouts and near limitless views of Brooklyn, Manhattan, and Queens inherently unique to its modular construction.The residences at 461 Dean Street boast floor to ceiling windows, solar shades, wide plank walnut flooring, custom closet build-outs, and washers and dryers in each unit. Kitchens are outfitted with custom cabinetry, Caesarstone countertop and stone backsplash, stainless steel GE appliances, and integrated dishwashers and microwaves. Bathrooms are appointed with white quartz stone wall panels, polished chrome Grohe and Duravit fixtures, custom walnut medicine cabinetry, and wall hung Toto toilets.The robust amenity offering at 461 Dean Street is comprised of a sky lounge and rooftop terrace, state of the art fitness center, yoga, and dance studio, residents lounge with a catering kitchen and dedicated party room, a game room with billiards and ping-pong, and a children's playroom.At the nexus of Brooklyn's most vibrant neighborhoods is Pacific Park Brooklyn. This TWO BEDROOM Garden Duplex has a WBFP, 1.5 Baths ,an Open kitchen and a new WALK-IN CLOSET ! The LOFTLIKE main floor is stunning ! You will enjoy living on one of the prettiest Boerum Hill blocks. So convenient to many Subways ! The PARLOR floor is lovely with just enough low key/elegant detail and so much living and wall space. A super contemporary kitchen has a big cooking island and very nice cabinetry ;it's almost new as it was recently installed. The cabinetry is sharp +will exceed your expectations ! This is a super well designed space you'll enjoy with a couple of DINING areas to choose from and office area as well ! I love this fabulous " BIG " picture window that faces the garden. Bring in the light :-). The rental has a DISHWASHER and WASHER/DRYER in unit . Each bedroom downstairs has two windows ! The location is amazing. The heat and hot water are paid by the renter . One small pet on case by case basis.

Location.StreetIntersection: Bet N Basin Rd and 46th Ave

BasicDetails.Description:
**NO FEE + 1 MONTH FREE LUXURY 2BR ON LIC'S WATERFRONT**

Now available is a beautifully laid out 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom home on LIC's waterfront with stunning views from every room. Available immediately, NO FEE, 1ST MONTH FREE, for a 1-2 year lease option.

This split bedroom apartment features an open spacious layout, condo-like finishes, oversized windows, oak wood floors, entry foyer with large coat closet, a modern kitchen with black caesarstone countertops, white lacquer cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, W/D in unit, ample closet space throughout, and South/West exposure with direct views of the Manhattan skyline. You will love the Master Bedroom which has large windows flooding the room with warm natural light, has 2 large closets, and a en-suite Master Bath with great storage space.

This full service luxury amenity towers is LEED-certified, pet friendly, and provides residents with the best amenities in the area. You'll have access to an amenity package consisting of 24-hour concierge, a package room, valet service, children's playroom, a high-tech fitness center, yoga room, a 50,000 square foot landscaped sun deck which includes a 2ft reflecting pool, BBQ & lounge area, beach volleyball court, 2 tennis courts, a great lawn, children's playground, a 1000-car parking garage, and retail on the ground floor. All of this located within steps from Gantry Plaza State Park. There are 3 dog parks in the area, brand new schools, 4 play grounds, and a variety of restaurants to choose from. Only 1 stop (and 5 min) on the 7 train from Grand Central. Building provides a free shuttle service to the Vernon/Jackson Ave. station in case you don't feel like walking. Also within walking distance of the E,M, & G trains.

Please contact me to schedule a private showing of this apt. I am available 7 days a week. **NO BROKER FEE. Prospective tenants will be subject to an application review and credit check through TF Cornerstone. $100/person**Gross rent is $4,255/month. Advertised rent is the net rent of $3,900, based 1st month free on a 12 month lease.

Stunning two bed two bath with full-time doorman and private washer and dryer in mint condition towering over the Meatpacking District and West Village. Spectacular views of the entire Downtown skyline including New York Harbor and the World Trade Center will inspire you from morning to night. Step into a graceful entry foyer and take in the beautiful open kitchen with integrated appliances and caesarstone counters. Your large master suite with five piece ensuite bath is the perfect place to dream. The split bedroom layout ensures maximum privacy between the master and large second bedroom. Amenities include private roof deck, resident's lounge, zen meditation garden and discounted membership to on-site Equinox Health Club. The Caledonia is the anchor of the High Line. Chelsea Market, the West Village, Morimoto, The Dream Hotel and any number of incredible restaurants, entertainment and shopping options are literally right downstairs. A simply incredible opportunity.

A magnificent junior one bedroom home with in-unit washer & dryer next to the High Line with Hudson River view and is filled with light and class for rent. Amazing views of downtown New York, the Hudson River and the Meatpacking district await you. The appliances and finishes are top of the line quality and the oversized windows provide breath-taking views and plenty of light throughout the entire day. The Caledonia Condominium is adjacent to the High Line, New York's most unique and exciting urban park! You're right next to the meatpacking district, the art gallery district, the Chelsea Market... Explore the delightful nightlife and the world class restaurants of this highly sought-after neighborhood in the ultra luxury of this home. Apple Store, Google building, West Village, and etc. are all a stone's throw away. A, C, E, and L trains are also conveniently nearby. As the very first luxury condominium built along the High Line, The Caledonia not only boasts luxurious homes with premium amenities, but it remains one of the only residential buildings offering residents direct access to the High Line. Constructed in 2006, The Caledonia, developed by Related and designed by Handel Architects, is the premier West Chelsea residence. At the crossroads of Chelsea, The West Village, The Meat Packing District, and minutes to Chelsea Market, Hudson River Park and Chelsea Piers, The Caledonia is positioned at the nexus of culture, entertainment and convenience. It features a meditation zen garden, a resident's lounge, a business center, 24-hour concierge, on-site laundry, live-in super, bike room, roof deck and so much more. Contact Calvin now to schedule a viewing.

Luxurious Finishes - This sleek, spacious contemporary apartment is a beautiful home, flooded with southern light that baths the apt. through floor to ceiling windows. Remote control solar shades are fitted on all the windows, with additional remote blackout shades in both bedrooms. The apt. has 9.5' ceilings and hardwood floors throughout. The open gourmet kitchen is a chef's delight featuring a Sub-Zero refrigerator, Miele dishwasher, Viking oven, as well as a Marvel wine fridge, finished with terrazzo flooring, stainless steel and glass cabinetry, and polished quartzite counter top. The master bedroom offers a large custom designed walk-in California closet and an en-suite spa-like master bath with a free standing Philippe Stark soaking tub, and a separate rain shower stall, limestone floors and double sinks set in Bianco marble. There's an advanced heating and cooling system throughout the apartment, and a washer/dryer. SORRY NO PETS The Chelsea Modern is perfectly located in West Chelsea's trendy Gallery district, steps from the Highline Park, one block to the Hudson River Park and two restaurants on the block and an abundance of boutiques and lounges on the avenue, and just four blocks to the buzz of the Meat Packing district.The Chelsea Modern is 12-story, 47-residence boutique development and the winner of two architecture awards and the building features: 24-hour doorman, concierge, cold storage, bike storage, and a fitness room. A Zen garden and Roof deck

A MUST SEE & PETS ALLOWED!!A gorgeous triplex one bedroom apartment with private outdoor space in an elevator building! Easy access to the second avenue subway and cross town bus. The building features an elevator, a virtual doorman and small gym in the basement. One or two year lease available. Schedule a showing today!

Sunny penthouse apartment waiting for you to call it home! Sun light floods the entire apartment through an 18 ft. floor to ceiling window and two skylights in the kitchen! Lovely duplex one bedroom, one bath apartment with an alcove to be used as your home office or nursery and plenty of closet space! Living room features a working wood-burning fireplace, a large balcony with city views and an open kitchen with wood cabinetry and granite finishes. Hardwood floors, skylights, and oversized windows add to this home's beautiful finishes!Elevator building with a virtual doorman/concierge, package, laundry and fitness rooms.
A real gem in a beautiful quiet, safe and convenient neighborhood. The newly opened 2nd Avenue Subway Q line is only 3 minutes away.

Features:- Top floor (penthouse) - Two skylights with great natural lighting- Huge balcony with views accessible from living room- Elevator, virtual doorman/concierge, package, laundry and fitness rooms in building- Working wood-burning fireplace- Alcove next to bedroom that can be used for study / nursery/ meditation/ additional storage- Huge closets- Approximately :730 Sq Ft

434 East 143rd Street is a recently renovated, 400 sq ft one bedroom home on the garden floor of this Mott Haven townhouse. This home was renovated from corner to corner this year and you'll be the very first person to live in this apartment. Enjoy your own private entry, living on a townhouse block and the joys of living in this growing neighborhood. Visit us via the Brook Avenue subway station on the 6 line.

FIRST OPEN HOUSE THIS SUNDAY - OCTOBER 15TH 3-430PM & MONDAY 5-630PM BY APPT ONLY. PLEASE EMAIL OR CALL TO MAKE APPT!

YOU CAN CHOOSE THE COLOR OF YOUR WALLS in this HUGE, 850 sq. ft space, with living room and bedroom 12x30 each. Very friendly building. VERY RARE & BEAUTIFUL LAYOUT! MUST SEE!! NON-SMOKERS only, please.
November 1st - MOVE IN

Lots of closets, 8' of closet space, in a large, bright, prewar one bedroom apartment with an additional space for home office in a townhouse on East 87 Street near 1 Ave. Open eat-in-kitchen with a loft like feeling living room with hardwood floors. Marble bathroom, new kitchen cabinets, new stainless steel appliances, dishwasher.

1.5 blocks from subway: E 86 St and Second Ave. express Q train, E 86 St and Lex Ave express trains #4 and #5 and local #6, crosstown, uptown/downtown buses and water taxi to midtown and downtown. 10 minute walk to the Central Park, Metropolitan Museum of Art and other museums, 24 hours supermarkets and pharmacies, near major electronics and book stores, 5 full service gyms in the immediate neighborhood, tons of restaurants, 5 minutes to the Gracie's Mansion (Mayors of NYC residence), East River Promenade and Carl Shurtz Park.

Huge 3 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment.Updated. Optional Parking. Hardwood Floors.The King Size Master Bedroom Has A Full Size En-Suite Bathroom. Large Closets Keep The Space Organized. Large Eat In Kitchen And Bonus Room That Can Be Used As A Formal Dining Room Or Family Room Has A Skylight. Full Hallway Bathroom The Other Two Bedrooms. Near To Schools,Public Transportation! 917-655-9318

High floor 1 Bedroom at The Ascot! . This western exposure apartment has been totally renovated.. Apartment Features new wood floors, oversized windows, renovated kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, renovated bath and amazing custom closets ..

Building Features: Six Apartments per floor, Courtyard, coming soon a newly renovated Roof Deck with 360 degree views, storage, fitness center, laundry and 24hr Concierge.

PENTHOUSE DUPLEX WITH PRIVATE OUTDOOR TERRACE!! This RARE One Bedroom Loft Apartment has been completely Gut Renovated with Top of the Line Finishes throughout and features High Ceilings, an Open Kitchen, Full Size Appliances, New Marble Bathroom, Hardwood Floors, Large City Windows and Great Closet Space. Access to Private Roof Space off the bedroom. Located in a Charming Pre-War building on a Beautiful Tree Lined Block in Prime Hell's Kitchen, Walking distance to Lincoln Center/Central Park/Chelsea and all Major Transportation. Available NOW - Pets Welcome. *PRICE IS NET EFFECTIVE OF 1 FREE MONTH FOR IMMEDATE MOVE IN

RARE OFFERING * TRUE 4BR/3BA + 2 PRIVATE TERRACES * LIC WATERFRONT LUXURY*

*NO PETS ALLOWED FOR RENTERS*

Perched high above the beautiful waterfront Gantry Plaza State Park, this is a unique opportunity to experience all that Long Island City (LIC) has to offer from this expansive Four-bedroom, Three-bathroom home. With amazing sunset views of the famed New York City skyline & East River, every day you can watch the city that never sleeps come alive right in front of your eyes.

Conveniently located only one stop on the 7-train from Grand Central, this spacious residence boast tons of amazing features that make it exceptionally unique and one-of-a-kind. Triple exposures north, south, and west bathe the home in natural sunlight from morning to night. With over 2,000 square feet of living space, 2 private terraces, a new modern kitchen featuring top-of-the-line appliances such as a Sub-Zero refrigerator, Dacor gas stove, and Miele dishwasher, this property has everything.

From the moment you enter the main living space (26-foot by 29-foot), you'll be dreaming of the magical moment when you have all your closest friends over to watch the epic fireworks display that takes places just outside your windows on the 4th of July. The wall-to-wall windows create an expansive view and frame the Manhattan skyline. The high ceilings and rich Armstrong grey stone floors are a lovely feature that elevates this property.

The ultra-modern pass-through kitchen creates a beautiful pop of color with its European red cabinets and rose granite floors and countertops, while the home's bedroom layout takes full advantage of the units 3 exposures. Each room offers equally stunning views of the New York City skyline, as well as ample closet space and artfully crafted en-suite bathrooms, featuring unique tile work. The master bath has a six-foot Jacuzzi tub to soak in after a long day of work. Two of the bedrooms have private terrace access that provides breathtaking North and South views. A fourth room can serve as an additional bedroom or home office. In New York City, storage is a premium. This apartment solves that problem by offering tons of closet space and built-ins throughout the entire home.

Citylights is a 42-story building with 522 units designed by Argentine-American architect Cesar Pelli. Residents are rewarded with stunning, unobstructed views of the NYC skyline, as well as a lengthy list of amenities including a 24-hr doorman, concierge, five-story garage, high-tech fitness center, sauna, two tennis courts, and a landscaped rooftop.

Long Island City is currently the fastest growing city in the US, making it one of the most sought-after neighborhoods, not only in New York City but the world. Around every corner, there are hidden gems just waiting to be discovered. From unique restaurants, cafés, shopping, waterfront parks, dog runs, bowling, trivia nights, yoga, Crossfit, rock climbing, art studios, children's playgrounds, and community events, Long Island City has it all, while still maintaining a certain "neighborhood" charm that sets it apart from other areas in NYC.

Having access to both the nearby 7 train and 2 ferry stops provides multiple options for your commute. The convenience of having so many transportation options means that you'll find yourself arriving places earlier than your friends who live in Manhattan. You can be in the city in less than 5 minutes and to Wall Street in 25 minutes.

Please contact me to set up a private viewing.

This spacious two-bedroom/one-bathroom apartment is located in the residential Washington Heights neighborhood. Nestled on a quiet tree-lined block, the apartment has shiny hardwood floors and high ceilings throughout. Upon entrance is a large foyer, which connects the dining room, living room and kitchen. The apartment has several large windows that boast plenty of natural sun exposure. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, hickory cabinets and cupboards and a deep sink. There is a glass pass through French door in the kitchen as well. Air conditioners are in every room. A hallway connects both king-sized bedrooms. Both bedrooms have double closets for plenty of storage space. The bathroom has a sliding glass tub door; as well as white fixtures and vertical shower. This building offers video intercoms in all units for safety and a live in super. Building amenities include elevator, laundry room, bike room, storage room, outdoor backyard space/vegetable garden, and 24 hour video surveillance cameras throughout. There is a parking garage on the corner for a nominal fee. Only one block away from both the 1 and A trains. This apartment is the perfect charming and cozy place to call home.

Stunning and stylish loft in PRIME Fashion District location. Featuring soaring 14-foot ceilings, this loft apartment features a modern kitchen and bath, new floors and (almost) floor to ceiling windows. The main level has plenty of room for a living and dining area and is perfect for entertaining while watching the parades march down Fifth Avenue. There is also a LARGE closet on the main level. Straight stairs lead you to the bedroom area, which has a height clearance of approximately 6 feet and has enough square footage to support a full KING BR set. There is also a closet in the loft area. 372 Fifth Avenue is a full-service building with a full-time doorman, live-in super, multi-floor laundry, and a fantastic roof deck with PRIME Empire State Views. Pets OK!

NO FEE. NET EFFECTIVE RENT LISTED, 1000 SECURITY DEPOSIT (Exclusions Apply), GUARANTOR ACCEPTED, IMMEDIATE OCCUPANCY. Designed for avant-garde living, 363 Bond Street brings everything you've come to expect in a luxury Brooklyn apartment to a neighborhood that's refreshingly unexpected. Your space to dwell where local art and local tastes converge. Our luxury Brooklyn apartments are outfitted with your comfort in mind with custom Italian designed kitchen cabinetry, quartz countertops and islands, BOSCH stainless steel appliances including gas range cooking, wide plank hardwood floors, washer/dryer, and Nest thermostats. When the sun's up, relax poolside at the Brooklyn Crush Rooftop Pool with sundeck and mural by Tristan Eaton. Head to Social by 363, our resident lounge complete with bar, fireplace, billiards and tech room. Visit the Green by 363 and entertain at one of the private barbeque cabanas, or simply relax and lay in the grass at our rooftop lawn. Stay healthy at 363 FIT with Precore machines, PELOTON spin bikes and free weights spread across 4,000 SF and centered at the Yoga Studio by 363. Named Brooklyn's new hot spot by Conde Nast Traveler, Gowanus has a distinctly industrial character and is home to the city's most mouthwatering eateries, avant-garde galleries, and innovative businesses. Walk its streets and discover the city's best Italian coffee, rock climbing walls, co-working spots, and the only Whole Foods Market in Brooklyn. Here, you're steps away from the Park Slope R train and the Carroll Street F train which gets you to Manhattan in under 10 minutes. This is the beating heart of Brooklyn's best new neighborhood.

When the sun's up, relax poolside at the Brooklyn Crush Rooftop Pool with sundeck and mural by Tristan Eaton. Head to Social by 363, our resident lounge complete with bar, fireplace, billiards and tech room. Visit the Green by 363 and entertain at one of the private barbeque cabanas, or simply relax and lay in the grass at our rooftop lawn. Stay healthy at 363 FIT with Precore machines, PELOTON spin bikes and free weights spread across 4,000 SF and centered at the Yoga Studio by 363. Named Brooklyn's new hot spot by Conde Nast Traveler, Gowanus has a distinctly industrial character and is home to the city's most mouthwatering eateries, avant-garde galleries, and innovative businesses. Walk its streets and discover the city's best Italian coffee, rock climbing walls, co-working spots, and the only Whole Foods Market in Brooklyn. Here, you're steps away from the Park Slope R train and the Carroll Street F train, which gets you to Manhattan in under 10 minutes. This is the beating heart of Brooklyn's best new neighborhood.

Available furnished or unfurnished. Dramatic 6,200 sq. ft. full-floor duplex loft in boutique condominium building.

A key-lock elevator opens directly into an expansive sun-flooded living room with beautiful exposed brick, floor-to-ceiling windows under 13-foot ceilings, and a wood-burning fireplace. The apartment also features a chef's kitchen with cherry wood cabinetry, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances.

There are 3 bedrooms, can be easily converted into 4 bedrooms, 3 lavish bathrooms, and two enclosed terraces The massive master bedroom has a spa-like bathroom with double-sink vanity, glass-enclosed steam shower, and deep soaking tub.

The apartment also features central air conditioning, and is wired for broadband internet and cable. Custom lighting throughout.

D'Arte House at 354 Broadway is located steps from dining, shopping, transportation and all the best that Tribeca has to offer.

Furnished bright one bedroom with fantastic view at the Orion, an extraordinary condo building on 42nd Street close to transportation (steps away from 14 subway lines), nightlife and world-class shopping and attractions. Floor-to-ceiling windows fill the apartment with light and Western views to the Hudson River and beyond. Central AC, Valcucine kitchen, and cherry hardwood floors. The Orion features a full-floor fitness center by La Palestra with a double-lane lap pool, whirlpool, sauna and yoga room, business center, multiple sundecks, club room with entertaining terrace, screening room. Services include full-time doorman, concierge services with refrigerated storage, dry-cleaning service, and an on-site garage. The Orion is a towering, 60-story, 551-unit glass residential building in Midtown West that was completed in 2006 and has since been the apple of many buyer's and renter's eyes. The Orion puts its residents smack dab between 8th and 9th avenues, where restaurants, Times Square, the Theater District and myriad subway and busses are right outside your door. If you can pay your way into this superstar building, you will get the royal treatment. Voted one of the top amenity and service buildings in NYC, The Orion offers a full-time doorman, on-site garage, concierge services and an amazing three-story amenity suite that includes a fitness center by La Palestra, lap pool, whirlpool, club and screening room, business center, multiple sundecks and security systems. Even the huge 29th-floor laundry room commands killer views of Manhattan and the Hudson River. Lease term is flexible from 6 months minimum to 1 year. Please contact Calvin now for showing.

Extra LARGE 1 Bedroom with private balcony. ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED. Close proximity to South Street Seaport, transportation, and some of the best shopping, restaurants, and museums that Manhattan has to offer. Easy Application Process!

Amenities include: 24 Hour Security, Elevator, Laundry, Live-in Super, and pet friendly!

Beautiful bright x.large one bedroom apartment with stunning high 9"4' ceilings. Totally brand new renovation with hardwood floors throughout. The windowed kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, granite counter top, lots of wood cabinetry, a dishwasher and large stainless steel LG refrigerator. The wonderful bright bedroom captures great light through its many windows. It is north facing onto a beautiful tree lined street and has excellent storage with a double closet with sliding doors and additional storage above. There is also another closet in the hallway. The sparkling windowed bathroom features gorgeous marble tiles and marble floor, bath/shower and a mirrored medicine cabinet with additional storage. Wonderfully located right by the Hudson river and just moments to the 1 train subway and cross town buses. Within 2 blocks you can find a chemist, Gristedes food market, Juice Generation, Starbucks, AMC theatre lots of restaurants and much more. Elevator, laundry in the basement and live -in super.*photos symmetrical to this unit

Huge 1,100 square foot apartment in the heart of Fort Hamilton. Two gigantic bedrooms make this apartment one of the most spacious in the neighborhood, and boasts New granite countertops and tiled floors in the kitchen.

Location.StreetIntersection: River Side Dr. & West End Ave

BasicDetails.Description:
Located on a short and beautiful tree-lined block between Riverside Drive and West End Avenue, 324 West 80th Street is a rare 24-foot wide limestone townhouse, recently renovated with a brand new elevator. It offers over 8,000 square feet of living space with 6 bedrooms and 7.5 bathrooms. Built in 1898-1899 by noted architect, Clarence True, this six-story home features a stunning Elizabethan Renaissance Revival style bow-front façade with Roman brick and limestone trim and a ceramic tile pitched roof. Inside, generous proportions and bright light abound.

The Entry Floor welcomes guests into a gracious reception gallery with modern ribbon fireplace and a magnificent cherry wood sculptural staircase. A library and guest bedroom with full bath are located in the rear in addition to a separate service entrance on the western front of the house.

The Parlor Floor boasts almost 11-foot ceilings and offers a formal living room that spans the entire width of the house. It features a gas fireplace with remote-starter and a built-in wet bar. The south-facing dining room, with original dentil molding and beamed ceiling, is ornamented by a Juliet balcony that overlooks the house garden through stained glass windows. A professional-grade windowed chef's kitchen services the dining room and boasts a separate stainless steel prep area with industrial kitchen faucet sprayer, glass Sub Zero refrigerator, separate Sub Zero beverage refrigerator, Viking range, Monogram double ovens with a separate warming drawer, and two Bosch dishwashers. A powder room is located off the floor landing.

Upstairs on the Fourth Floor are three bedrooms. The rear south-facing bedroom serves as a second master suite and features a fireplace, two walk-in closets and an en-suite bath with double vanity, Jacuzzi tub and separate shower. A second full bathroom is located off the floor landing.

The Fifth Floor is dedicated to the master suite and highlights a spacious south-facing bedroom with fireplace and a windowed marble bath complete with a digitally controlled walk-in rain shower with double shower-heads, free-standing egg-shaped soaking tub, double vanity and heated floors and towel bars. A secondary full marble bathroom, sitting area with fireplace and a windowed dressing room with custom vanity and built-ins complete the floor.

The home's generous offering of entertaining space continues on the Sixth Floor with a sky-lit lounge with almost 18-foot ceilings. It is serviced by an auxiliary kitchenette with stainless steel appliances, a copper-top bar, large-screen TV and custom sound. There is also a guest bedroom with full bath and an enormous walk-in closet. Combined, all of these elements enable the floor to serve as an elegantly appointed guest suite/apartment, if so desired.

Beyond, a beautifully designed floating wood staircase off the lounge leads to a fully decked and planted Rooftop terrace featuring a temperature-controlled pavilion with wet-bar, glorious west, south and north views as well as custom lighting and sound.

The fully-finished Garden Level is spotlighted by a home theater, 500-bottle wine cellar, home office/secondary bedroom with full kitchenette, full bath, laundry, plentiful storage as well as a beautiful south-facing patio garden.

Additional features of the home include custom mink grey -stained oak floors throughout and a brand new high-speed Savaria elevator servicing the Entry through Sixth Floors. The new Sonos sound system, custom Lutron lighting (automated sensor lighting on all landings), and electronic front door can all be controlled by your cell phone. Also available for sale at $13,700,000.

NO FEE
Free Month on a 2 Year Lease
Brand New, Gut Renovated, DUPLEX apartment.

This unit features hardwood floors, 9 ft 10in. ceilings, an open kitchen with a granite
breakfast bar. Full size stainless steel appliances (including a Dishwasher), modern
cabinets, your own entry foyer and an in unit WASHER/DRYER.

Short Term and long term lease available
Pets & Guarantors Allowed

Great location surrounded by great restaurants, cafes, and an incredible shopping center
less than 2 blocks away! East River Plaza boasts 485,000 square feet of retail,
Costco, Target, Planet Fitness, Bobs Discount Furniture, Applebee's and many more. Only a
few blocks to the M15 bus and the 6 train (E 116).
Lower level photo is a similar stock photo. Please see floorplan.

Unique Brownstone ApartmentBeautiful floor through, large 1 bedroom UWS rental is on a tree- lined block, has 11 foot ceilings, 1.5 baths and washer dryer. The apartment has a renovated open kitchen, with floor to ceiling cabinets, double door refrigerator, dishwasher and plenty of counter space. There is a door, which separates the large bedroom furnished with a double width mirrored closet and cabinets built above for storage. Double height windows faces North, and there is new widow treatment. The master bathroom is a very contemporary design and there is a washer/dryer in the bathroom for your convenience. The Living room has a decorative fireplace and 2 double height windows facing South, with new window blinds providing plenty of light to reflect off the wooden floors. There is also a double-wide closet leading to the bedroom. Pets may be considered in certain cases upon landlord approval.

Welcome to the waterfront living in this west facing home on the 31st floor with 9 feet ceiling. Relax while you watch the stunning sunsets from every room of this gorgeous apartment of 1190sqft living space, 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms, separate master suite with double marble sinks, soaking tub and separate glass shower. Oversized windows - and a custom kitchen with a stone countertops, Miele dishwasher, Viking gas range, Subzero refrigerator/freezer, and a U-line wine cooler. Open living concept with incredible views of the Statue of Liberty, and the Hudson River. Green living meets luxurious amenities in this LEED gold certificated building. With its 24 hour concierge and doorman, 1,500 Sq Ft Fitness room, Bicycle Storage, Children's Playroom & Valet Parking. Its air filtration system provides residents with fresh tempered and filtered air directly to the apartment. Its solar rooftop, advanced mechanicals and rooftop water cachet system are all designed to save energy as well as reduce building expenses. Just steps from 25-acre Battery Park, Sirius Dog Run, Eataly NYC Downtown, Le District, Regal Cinemas movie theater complex, and Brookfield Place and Westfiled WTC shopping centers. Only several minutes walk to Wall Street, Tribeca, and close to all subway lines, and fantastic restaurants and shops. Please contact Calvin for showing.

GREAT 1 BEDROOM / 1 BATHROOM APARTMENT

NO FEE - NET EFFECTIVE RENT LISTED*
GUARANTOR ACCEPTED

Integrating the highest quality design with innovative architecture and sophisticated elegance, the residences at Aurora surpass the expectations of even the most discerning tastes.

Floor-to-ceiling windows frame impressive views of the city skyline and illuminate brilliant natural light throughout every room. Clean lines, white oak flooring and light, modern finishes unify both use and design.

Aurora's fluid living, kitchen and dining spaces are emphasized by white lacquer cabinetry, pure white quartz countertops, and a full height backsplash. Seamlessly paneled appliances featuring a Leibherr refrigerator, five-burner Bertazzoni range, and Bosch dishwasher set a new standard for rental residences in LIC.

Each bathroom offers premium Grohe and Toto fixtures with recessed lighting, and pure white quart stone and lacquer vanities. Select units feature glass enclosed showers.

An exclusive full-floor rooftop amenity space defined by soaring eighteen-foot full-height glass curtain walls. Aurora Sky Lounge is a continuation of the buildings modern architecture, featuring plush seating, high-definition television, Wi-Fi access, entertaining kitchenette, and a live edge dining table with seating for 10. The space extends out to Auroras Sky Deck, a beautifully landscaped, roof-top sun terrace complete with an outdoor grilling station, misting shower, chaise lounges, and intimate seating. This dramatic setting is perfect to take in the spectacular river and skyline views while relaxing or entertaining. Aurora Sky Fitness is a state-of-the-art fitness center offering free weights, high-tech cardio and strength training equipment from Life Fitness.

Additional amenities include: 24-hour attended lobby, bicycle and personal storage, laundry facilities, valet service, a package room, and on-site parking.

*Advertised rent is net effective based on the first month free on 13 months. Gross rent is $2,950. Concession is one month free OR owner pays one-month broker fee. These concessions are for new tenants only.

Location.StreetIntersection: Between Broadway and W End Ave

BasicDetails.Description: Beautiful elegant marble floor entrance way and waiting area. Warm, friendly staff to greet you. Stunning chandeliers adorn the foyer and mirrored elevator hallway with charming crown moldings. Excellent location. The Whitehall is by the 1,2, 3 trains and crosstown buses. Within 10 minutes you are in Times square on the express 2,3 train. Perfect location for travelling downtown and across town. Columbia University, Hudson River, Central Park, Riverside Park, Wholefoods, Westside market and almost every type of cuisine within blocks. The bright studio boasts great storage with 2 closets, crown moldings and city views. The renovated kitchen showcases stainless steel appliances, plentiful cabinetry, and a microwave. The Whitehall features 24 hour doormen, great security, complimentary common storage, laundry in the building, stunning sun deck complete with city views, bbqs and outdoor furniture for those hot summer nights. UTILITIES INCLUDED (hot water, heat, gas & electricity)!

Welcome to this beautiful duplex multi floor unit with exclusive gated courtyard entry, nice hard wood floors, a full bathroom and a separate powder room. The unit is in a lovely new construction building near 30th Ave (N/Q) subway station with an elevator, Video intercom and in unit Washer and Dryer. Details include: Two full closets, a big private storage, open kitchen with full kitchen appliances- Fridge/Dish Washer/Oven/Microwave. Central Heat and AC have been installed. Convenient to all transportation. Easy and fast approval. Available now.

Time Warner Center 2 Bed/2.5 Bath Gracious Sized Home (1423 Sq Feet) with 10 Foot High Ceilings, in Pristine Condition. Floors Newly Refinished. Impeccably well maintained. Open River and City Views from Floor-to-Ceiling Windows. Luxurious Master Bathroom with Statuary Marble, Soaking Tub, Separate Shower, and Double Sinks. Spacious Bedrooms with Abundant Storage. Central Air. Laundry in home. White Glove 5 Star Condominium with Gym, Children's Playroom, Screening Room, Event/Dining/Party Room, Outdoor Lounging Terrace and Dog Run, Parking Garage with Valet, and 75 Foot Pool/Spa. One of Manhattans most coveted addresses. Ready for immediate occupancy. Photos are virtually staged.

Net Effective Rend Listed241 Atlantic offers sprawling floorplans, featuring full-sized kitchens complemented by white quartz countertops, soft-touch closing cabinets custom made in Italy, with Beko and Bloomberg stainless-steel appliances. Each home offers multiple spacious closets, separate dressing areas, and full-size washers and dryers by Beko. Select residences include a private terrace overlooking the East River and Downtown Brooklyn.For your convenience, a part-time and virtual doorman provide 24-hour coverage for deliveries, guests, and more. Natural walnut finishes and black granite floors stretch across the lobby, leading you to the tastefully landscaped courtyard full of quiet nooks to relax and comfortable areas to gather with friends. Impress your guests as you host your next dinner party or catch the big game in the resident lounge, an extension of your home. At 241 Atlantic, we understand that exercise is important to you, which is why we offer easy access to a full-service Planet Fitness gym. Keep the clutter and chaos out of your home with bike and personal storage available to tenants.

Integrating the highest quality design with innovative architecture and sophisticated elegance, the residences at 1 QPS surpass the expectations of even the most discerning tastes.

Floor-to-ceiling windows frame impressive views of the city skyline and illuminate brilliant natural light throughout every room. Clean lines, white oak flooring and light, modern finishes unify both use and design.

Each bathroom offers premium Duravit deep bathtubs with recessed lighting, and pure white quartz stone vanities.

An exclusive full-floor rooftop pool with BBQ's.
